reviews.author: Rena Shaw
reviews.text: Be very very careful before you apply here they make you pay the admin fee before accepting you then won’t give it back if you don’t move in. They called me the day after I applied and made it seem they were going to deny me so I went with a different complex. I asked for the Admin fee back since a apartment wasn’t going to be held for me anyways and they never called back or refunded me. So I paid $200 for them to call me and say they wouldn’t let me have an apartment unless I paid the rent plus cost of rent for the deposit and never get the admin fee back. Probably best I didn’t move somewhere that is just after you money probably means they don’t care for the tenants there I assume the bad reviews are true.
reviews.response_text:
Hello Rena,
We would like to apologize for your recent experience and sorry to hear you were less than
satisfied. We pride ourselves on our service and the high-quality standards we maintain
and would like to make things right. Please reach out to discuss what occurred and how we might make it up to you.

reviews.author: Alayna Mallory
reviews.text: Friendly staff but unresponsive. Submitted a request for a scheduled tour on Tuesday over the weekend (they are closed Saturday and Sunday), and started receiving automated promotional emails immediately. Did not hear from staff on Monday or Tuesday, but received an automated email at 7pm on Monday inviting me to tour during their open house “today at 1pm!” No dates listed, and I still hadn’t received a response, so I arrived at the office around 1:30pm on Tuesday when I had originally hoped to take a tour. The office manager Richy seemed to immediately recognize me (my emailed request), and knew I was looking for a two bedroom. Explained that he didn’t have a single unit available to tour on the whole property until the next day. I explained that I have a busy work schedule and couldn’t fit anything in until the following week, but was very interested in seeing any unit (even if it wasn’t the layout I was looking to rent). He told me to email him with my availability for the following week, which I did within three hours of leaving the office. It has been over 48 hours and I have not heard anything from the management team. Disappointed, as the property appears to be well maintained and I love the floor plans offered. I’ve lived in dozens of apartments in my life and know that if I can’t get a response from management before I’ve even moved in, there’s no way I’d receive prompt assistance if there were issues during my lease.
reviews.response_text: Alayna, we are so sorry to hear that you have not received the customer service that everyone deserves here at our community. This is very uncharacteristic of our staff. We want all of our residents to feel comfortable and at home, while living on the property, both at home and in the office. Please contact us at your earliest convenience so that we can address your issues and rectify this in any way we can.

reviews.author: Karen Chopper
reviews.text: Maintenance never comes even when you filed a work order OVER A WEEK AGO. Richy the new office manager of the month can’t even answer the phone & when he does, gives you a phony response. I can 100% tell you these “good reviews” are from the office manager begging people to give a good review when they come to check this place out. RUN. I can’t even fathom how shady this place has become.
reviews.response_text: Sierra, we're sorry to hear your time with us has not been the positive experience we aim to provide. Our team strives to maintain our community and apartment homes and it's disappointing to know we've missed the mark during your time with us. Please visit the office at your convenience so we may address any maintenance requests and work toward improving your experience in our community. Thank you.

reviews.author: Yulio
reviews.response_text:
Hi Yulio,
Thank you for the 5-stars at The Northern Apartments!!
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

reviews.author: Michael Steward
reviews.text: Been waiting on a microwave for over a month cause the one we had was shorting out all of the electricity. The dryer doesn’t work at all and they don’t care to fix it. The hot tub has been open all of 2 months in the 18 months I’ve lived here. And there’s a roach problem. I would take your money somewhere else.
reviews.response_text: Hello Michael Steward, we want to understand your disappointment. It’s important to us that our customers are more than satisfied and we would like the opportunity to resolve this issue immediately. reviews.response_text: Thanks for the stellar rating, Shawna Shovan! We're happy to hear you're enjoying your stay here at The Northern Apartments! reviews.author: María Rivera
reviews.response_text: We are grateful for your 5-star rating! Your support means everything to us at The Broadleaf.

reviews.author: Marvie Lynn
reviews.text: Writing another review! 5/5 for Maintenance crew and for Marco who helped service a few faulty things when I first moved into this apartment, 4/5 because apparently my living room windows were not installed  correctly :( (Not any of the staffs or maintenance crews fault, just so happened the construction crew who built the unit I was in installed the windows wrong, causing it to not open properly. Unfortunately it is not an easy fix and may have to replace the windows entirely, and may take a while. I am not in a rush to get it fixed anyways, since it is still winter. But shout out to Marco for being able to service everything else with ease and was able to address a lot of the issues I had! He was able to fix my ice maker that was completely frozen over!
reviews.response_text: We greatly appreciate your honest feedback and kind words about Marco and our maintenance team. We understand the window issue is frustrating and will work toward resolution.

reviews.author: Leo Yang
reviews.text: Overall, my experience has been excellent. The leasing office staff are very warm, friendly, and helpful. The apartment amenities and the overall environment are both very satisfying. All of these factors are what ultimately made me choose to live here.
reviews.response_text: We are pleased to hear about your excellent experience with our leasing staff and apartment amenities. Thank you for choosing us!

reviews.author: Ioana Calota
reviews.text: The staff is great, they made the move in go smooth and fast. I would recommend anytime.
reviews.response_text: Thank you for your review! We appreciate your recommendation and are glad our staff made your move smooth and fast.

reviews.author: Damian Carson
reviews.text: Super friendly staff. If it wasn’t for Sole, Christian, Sean, and the rest of the staff i never would have moved here. Beautiful community and my favorite i’ve lived in so far.
reviews.response_text: We are overjoyed to hear about your positive experience with Sole, Christian, Sean, and our team. Welcome home to our beautiful community!

reviews.author: Marvie-Lynn Manuel
reviews.text: Moved in after two days of viewing the place! Sole was great at making me feel welcomed and the process was easy peasy! A lot of great amenities! Tidy and clean!
reviews.response_text: Thanks for choosing us! Thrilled Sole made you feel welcomed and the move-in was easy. We appreciate your kind words!

reviews.author: Ana Beatriz Andrade de Carvalho
reviews.text: This place is wonderful! I couldn’t be more happier specially about the ones that work here. They are lifesavers! Every time I need any maintenance in my apartment Marco helps me with his kindness! Everyone around here is really great and helpful. So thankful for this community!

reviews.author: attilas hornea
reviews.text: I’m looking for a home for my grandparents and Christian has been BEYOND helpful.
reviews.response_text: We are happy to hear Christian has been so helpful finding a home for your grandparents.

reviews.author: Essence Grady
reviews.text: Alexis did a great job with providing me all the information I needed to know about these apartments! I love how clean and nice and friendly everyone is. Definitely recommend these apartments. Thank you Alexis for being so generous and helpful.
reviews.response_text: Thank you for your wonderful feedback! We're thrilled Alexis provided excellent service and you enjoyed our clean, friendly community.

reviews.author: De'Janae' Guillory-Williams
reviews.text: I had a great tour of this apartment complex with Alexis, who was friendly, knowledgeable, and very helpful throughout the entire process. The community is well maintained and located in a very convenient area, especially being close to where I work. The apartments are spacious and modern, and the amenities are amazing. The rooftop pool was definitely a highlight and really sets this place apart. If my lease was up or I didn’t already have a place to live, I would absolutely choose to live here.

reviews.text: I had a great experience visiting The Broadleaf Apartments in Aurora, CO over Christmas. I would definitely recommend it.

reviews.author: Michael Boncelet
reviews.text: I recently toured an apartment with Sole, and it was an outstanding experience from start to finish. She was incredibly knowledgeable about the property, pointing out all the key features like the spacious layout, appliances, and natural lighting without any pushy sales tactics. She answered every question I had with clear, honest insights and helped me visualize living there. The tour was efficient yet thorough, and her friendly, professional demeanor made the whole process enjoyable. If you're apartment hunting, I highly recommend reaching out to Sole—she's top-notch!

reviews.author: Mirabelle DeMaderios
reviews.text: My family and I moved into Broadleaf in May this year, and I’m loving it so far! It’s super clean and spacious and we get lots of sunlight through the windows. There’s a nice gym, co-working space, lounge, courtyard, and rooftop pool / barbecue area, which are all so nice and I use pretty often. The building and garage are also very secure. The only big issues I’ve had have been with the mail system sometimes not letting me access my packages (which has always been fixed by staff) or construction setting off the smoke detectors several times when we first moved in, but I think that has stopped at this point. All the staff here are so friendly and really go above and beyond to welcome you in and solve problems. They also host frequent events, which are great for meeting neighbors and I’ve had fun at every event I’ve been at :)
reviews.response_text: Your feedback is incredibly valuable! Thrilled you're loving the amenities and our team's support. Welcome to Broadleaf!

reviews.author: Ally Kratz
reviews.text:
Julie was absolutely fantastic! She gave me such a warm and thorough tour of Broadleaf Apartments. She took the time to explain everything, from the amenities to the floor plans, and answered all my questions without making me feel rushed. You can tell she genuinely cares about helping people find the right fit. The property itself is beautiful, but Julie’s friendliness and professionalism made the experience even better. I highly recommend scheduling a tour with her! My job ultimately placed me in a different city so I couldn’t rent here, but I would’ve in a heartbeat if my job kept me in Aurora!
Thank you Julie!
reviews.response_text: Thank you for sharing your wonderful feedback about Julie! We're thrilled she provided such exceptional service during your tour.

reviews.author: James Rios
reviews.text: My family and I moved in a few months ago and we completely regret it. Myself and so many other residents are about to brake our lease. The list of problems with this place is ridiculous! There is 4 elevators in this building and you’ll be lucky if they work and if they do work you have a 50/50 chance of getting stuck in them. The hallways smell like trash and covered in dog feces. When the power goes out you better have your own flashlights because there is NO EMERGENCY LIGHTING! I’m convinced that 90% of the reviews are fake because living here and talking to many residents I have yet to find someone who is happy here. I do have to give the staff a shoutout because they do everything they can to help us but they can only do so much! I had to give a 5 star because they won’t post my review if you give anything less than a 5. If you want to see the pictures click on my profile. It won’t post on the review for some reason.
reviews.response_text: Your concerns are noted. We understand your frustration with elevators, cleanliness, and emergency lighting. Please contact us at (844) 661-0531 to discuss these serious issues.

reviews.author: Alexandra mantilla Correcha
reviews.text:
I’ve had a wonderful experience at The Broadleaf. The complex is very clean, with modern finishes throughout. The common areas are high-quality, always tidy, and well-maintained. Even though it’s located near two hospitals, it’s impressively quiet.

The move-in process was smooth and easy—especially after a difficult situation with another complex where the verification process took two weeks and I didn’t receive a clear response by my move-in date. At The Broadleaf, everything was handled quickly and efficiently. I’m especially grateful to Juleiza, who was incredibly helpful and supportive during the entire application and move-in process.

As a special touch, we even received welcome gifts on our move-in day, which made us feel truly valued and at home.

The staff is always friendly, respectful, and ready to help. I truly recommend this beautiful community to anyone looking for a peaceful and well-managed place to live.
reviews.response_text: We are privileged to receive your positive feedback about your experience at The Broadleaf. Thank you for sharing your thoughts!

reviews.author: Juank Gomez
reviews.text: The apartments are modern, comfortable, and in a great location. The facilities are clean and well-maintained, and the staff is very friendly. Plus, the application process was simple and quick, which made the whole experience even better. Thank You Juleiza
reviews.response_text: We appreciate your kind words and are pleased to hear you had a positive experience at The Broadleaf.

reviews.author: Maria Hernandez
reviews.text:
First of all I want to specifically shout out Christian. He is by far the best leasing person i have EVER dealt with. He is professional, very attentive, and extremely patient. Honestly he deserves 10 out of 5 stars. I have worked with him since day 1 of my tour and he even let me tour multiple times after that as well as I was indecisive of the layout I wanted. He answers my calls promptly and ALWAYS has an upbeat attitude.

The building itself is great! I have lived in many luxury communities and this one is in the top 3! I love the rooftop pool, the gym, and the bright beautiful windows throughout.

The maintenance team is very quick to get to the work orders and I appreciate that VERY much! They are kind and very respectful when in your home.

The neighbors are super kind and I have already made friends with other pet parents! The dog park is a huge plus!

However, the reason i can't give out 5 stars is because I am a little disappointed in the access system. In all of the previous communities I have lived in, they ALL have the keypad lock to the unit so it doesn't need a fob or key, just a code. This place is fob only. So therefore I have no way of letting my dog walker come into my unit. I do understand they use the Butterfly MX to get into the building but it is essentially useless without being able to get into my unit. This is not luxury at all. If I am ever locked out of my unit due to not having my fob, I have to pay for an emergency maintenance request. I also am disappointed in not having a filtered fridge when every unit i toured did have one so I felt let down on that as well.

Overall, I am super happy to call this place my new home. I have loved it so far. You can't hear your neighbors or the hospital noise at all. I just wish it was truly luxury with a keypad lock instead of fob access to your unit. I do highly recommend this place though!! :)
reviews.response_text: We sincerely value your detailed feedback and are thrilled to hear about your positive experiences at The Broadleaf. We'll make sure to take your suggestions into consideration for future improvements. Thank you immensely!

reviews.author: B P
reviews.text: I just received an email today that "Your post that was submitted on 5/24/23 was rejected after reviewed by the property management." I guess they don't want me to tell you why you shouldn't stay here. Also, I didn't make a post on 5/24/23 as I was still on my current lease (moved in February 2023 and moved out August 2024). My post was after my lease. Believe all of the bad reviews that they let you see and the ones that they don't. The Curate Complex amenities are amazing (apartment layout, gym, rooftop lounges, and views) and that's it. Parking sucked (sometimes I had to park by the AMC movie theater and one time my car got towed, they said that we could park there, but you're subject to tow; also other apartment complexes, especially the one across the street, their residents were parking at our complex and walking across the street to their apartment as well as the apartments next door; even though a few months later, Curate, implemented parking rules (registration), I didn't notice any differences and didn't see one car towed. Every one should have had a designed parking spot, but they couldn't do that because they know that there's more apartments, than parking spaces and they basically said if you want that, you need to buy a carport or garage, which could be upwards of $200 or more, which is ridiculous) pool rules were horrible (never got to use it, due to what others have said about it), elevators were down for several months (handicapped people were struggling going up all of those floors), several of my packages were stolen (sometimes it came to my apartment, sometimes in went in my building mail room, sometimes it went in the kiosk, and if it went in the mail room in the Office Building (good luck because people were taking packages off of the shelves and even with cameras right there, they couldn't prove who packages wasn't yours). I have OCD and cleaned my apartment 3X better than the condition that I received my apartment and they stood my deposit because I decided not to use their Spruce company to clean. Every month they kept sending me an email for their services. If you're deciding to move out and don't use a professional company or their Spruce, they won't give you your deposit back, even if your apartment was left better than you received it. They will tell you that they kept your deposit because they had to clean your apartment i.e. using their paid workers (Spruce) to clean the apartment anyways. Complete frauds. Also, my lease was up on Sunday, and they don't work on Sundays, so they charged me an extra day. I was like, how was I supposed to turn in my keys on a day that your Office isn't open. I didn't intend to write this post, but since they decided to send me an email that they deleted it, I'll just write another one, with specific details and examples like the other previous tenants. You probably won't see this post either because it'll probably get deleted too...It went downhill when the Office manager transferred to another property. I can't remember her name, but I wish I did.
reviews.response_text:
Hi BP, 
 I cannot find you in our system under that name. I'm sorry to hear that your experienceover a year ago was so negative.  Our management team is new since you have lived here and the issues. Many of the issues you describe here are not Curate policy. I would be happy to discuss any of your concerns and explain our current policies if it would help. Our elevators work, parking is available, and cleaning fees upon move out are not charged if we do not have to hire cleaners. Again - I'm so sorry to hear about your experience but I hope you are thriving in your new home. 
Best, 
Chloe Anderson
Community Director

I would highly recommend this property!!!!

They always provide high-quality maintenance service, along with any other concerns they address them very quickly.

CURATE is a wonderful place to move if you're looking to be closer to great restaurants and shops!

Update 2025: A little over a year and my fiancé and continued to enjoy our time here at Curate. We want to SHOUT OUT Virdiana the assistant manager and maintenance staff that truly goes above and beyond to make this place wonderful!

reviews.text: My husband and our 2 pups have been living here since July of 2024 and we absolutely love it! We recently downsized and are empty-nesters. Whenever we’ve had any maintenance issue, they are on top of it either that day or the next. Definitely signing another years lease!
reviews.response_text: We're pleased to hear that you and your family are enjoying your time at Curate at Orchard Town Center. Thank you for your positive feedback!

reviews.text:
I’ve had an amazing experience living at Curate at Orchard Town Center! The apartments are beautiful—modern design, spacious layouts, and top-notch amenities. The location is super convenient with shops, restaurants, and entertainment just a short walk away.

But what really makes Curate stand out is the staff. They are truly incredible—always friendly, responsive, and willing to go the extra mile to help. From the leasing office to maintenance, everyone is professional and genuinely cares about the residents. I’m so happy I chose to live here!
reviews.response_text: We're overjoyed to hear about your amazing experience at Curate at Orchard Town Center! Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.

reviews.text: Pearl Park Residances 35. Daire girişinde sanki hapishaneye gelmişsiniz havası mevcut. İçeri girdiğinizde sizi korku filmi gibi küçük küçük notlar karşılıyor. Ev 1+1 fakat salona perde asarak ve içerisine de ortasında tahta olan bir yatak koyup 2+1 gibiymiş gibi pazarlamaları çok komik. Yatağın şiltesi sanki yatak değil de denizde bir şezlong gibi ve çok rahatsız. Havlu yok. Temizlik sıfır. Açık ara hayatımda kaldığım en kötü ev. 0 yıldız verilmesi lazım ama malesef veremiyorum.

reviews.text: We recently hosted an event at The Confluence and had a wonderful experience from start to finish. The staff was incredibly friendly, helpful, and accommodating throughout the entire event, which made everything run smoothly. It was a great setting for our event, and we truly appreciated the professionalism and hospitality of the team. We would absolutely recommend The Confluence and look forward to working with them again!

reviews.author: Emma GLASS
reviews.text:
I’ve had the chance to come to the Confluence many times as a vendor, and every visit leaves me smiling. I just love the building, the residents, and the management! The location couldn’t be better, with amazing views and so close to the river, which makes it perfect for a walk.

What always stands out to me is how Abigail and the rest of the management team create such a warm, welcoming environment. You can really feel the sense of community, and it’s clear that neighbors here genuinely enjoy each other’s company.

And the dogs… they’re the sweetest! ❤️Every time I’m there, I see pups happily greeting each other, and their owners chatting and laughing together.

If you are looking to relocate in Denver and are searching for a well-located residence with great amenities and friendly neighbors, I would really consider the Confluence!
reviews.response_text:
Thank you so much for your kind feedback, Emma! We’ve truly enjoyed having you contribute to our community. Our goal is always to create a warm, welcoming, and friendly environment, and we’re so glad to hear that it’s shining through. And yes—we love our resident dogs just as much as our residents!

Thank you,
The Confluence

reviews.author: Hala M
reviews.text: This is easily the worst experience I’ve ever had with a rental property. I went to tour the place about a month ago with one of the leasing agents named Ross. The building was not luxurious by any means and had a ton of flaws, but I did like the location, so I decided to go with it. I got absolutely no follow up after the tour. I gave him the benefit of the doubt thinking he’s busy and I ended up applying for the apartment against my better judgement. I still didn’t hear back from them. I now have been trying to cancel my application and get my money back, and they have not even had the courtesy to reply. This is not the type of communication or treatment I’d expect from any rental property let alone a “luxury” one.
reviews.response_text:
Hi Hala,
I am the Community Director at The Confluence.  We're sorry to hear about your experience with us.  You are absolutely right — this is not how things should have unfolded, and I sincerely apologize for the frustration and inconvenience it has caused. Please know that this is not reflective of our usual standards or how we strive to support our applicants/residents.  I did try to call and also sent you an email.  I'd love to connect with you to address your concerns.   Please contact me at (720) 835-1441.

Thank you, 
Tara
Manager

reviews.text: The staff and community at the Confluence is amazing. They are very welcoming and do all types of events. It is a very unique place. reviews.response_text: Thank you for your kind words about our staff and events! We look forward to seeing you again soon!

reviews.author: Benjamin Paige
reviews.text:
Fantastic Experience

I don’t usually leave reviews for places I don’t actually stay at, but after visiting The Confluence for a baby shower a while back, I felt like I had to say something. From the moment we walked in, the staff made everything feel effortless—welcoming, helpful, and just overall wonderful.

Even though this isn’t an event venue, the entire day was so smooth and well-organized that you’d think it was. Abby (I think that was her name?) handled everything like a pro, a super helpful guy was running around making sure we had whatever we needed, and the woman at the front desk was amazing—she even helped us find a great local restaurant afterward.

The building itself is beautiful, spotlessly clean, and in an awesome location, but what really stood out was how genuinely kind and attentive everyone was. If this is what it’s like just visiting, I can only imagine how great it must be to live there. If I weren’t moving out of state, I’d 100% consider it!

Huge thanks to the team at The Confluence for making an already special day even better. Future residents—you’re in good hands!
reviews.response_text:

Team Confluence

reviews.author: Shari M
reviews.text:
Moving to Denver and touring apts. Jasper Towers said to check out Confluence as well.  So I tried to do so.  Confluence's scheduling process is truly broken.  I set an app't online and rec'd no app't confirmation. I then rec'd a call the next day they had double booked me and could I reschedule. I said I had a 2PM and 4PM app't. She said, how is 3?  I said great.  I showed up about 3:02PM.  I was kindly asked to wait for Ross.  I was offered water or coffee (nice!).  And I waited.  And waited. After about 15 min of no sign of Ross I politely advised I was leaving.  Receptionist was very kind. And that was it.  I went back and checked email and I had rec'd a confirmation for a 2PM app't that I didn't see as I was in tours all day.  Well, I guess if the scheduling and Leasing Agent attitudes were broken, probably not the best place for me.

Note:  The desk staff is lovely.  After I left I realized I had lost an earring.  I called Confluence's desk and they looked for it and called me when they found it.  Wonderful!
reviews.response_text:
Hi Shari,
I am Tara, the manager.  I apologize for your experience.  Unfortunately, Ross was assisting a resident at the time.  He's reached back out to you to reschedule if you'd like.  We'd love to show you around our beautiful community.

Tara

reviews.author: Michel Polania Sanchez
reviews.text:
I’m extremely disappointed with my experience living at Edison at RiNo. Our A/C went down on October 3rd, and despite multiple maintenance requests and follow-ups, it took over 3 weeks for management to even attempt a real fix. When they finally came on October 23rd to “recharge” the system, it still didn’t work and continued blowing warm air.

Communication throughout this process has been frustrating and unhelpful. Maintenance blamed the weather being “too cold” outside for the repair, but if that’s the case, why wasn’t this addressed when the issue was first reported — when temperatures were still warm?

In the meantime, they gave us a portable A/C unit which barely cools the bedroom and looks terrible sitting in the living space. For what this complex charges in rent and “luxury” fees, basic climate control should not be an issue.

Between the lack of urgency, poor explanations, and feeling ignored as a resident, I absolutely cannot recommend this place. Paying full rent while going weeks without proper A/C is unacceptable.
reviews.response_text:
We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused by the recent air conditioning issues and the delay in our team's response. We understand your frustration regarding the extended period from October 3rd to October 23rd without adequate climate control in your apartment, and we acknowledge that the communication throughout this process fell short of expectations. We recognize that the temporary portable A/C unit did not sufficiently meet your needs and appreciate your understanding. As a valued resident, you are entitled to prompt attention to essential services. Please contact us directly at (303) 732-5422 so we can promptly address this matter and ensure your complete satisfaction.

-Edison at Rino Team

reviews.author: Gerald Breceda
reviews.text:
I’ve lived in a few different apartments in Denver, and Edison at RiNo has easily been the best experience so far. The building is clean, modern, and really well-maintained. The amenities are great and actually usable — the gym is super convenient, the common areas are always spotless, and maintenance is fast and friendly whenever you need something.

But honestly, what really makes this place stand out is Natalie. From day one, she’s been so helpful, professional, and kind. She made the entire leasing process easy and stress-free, and she genuinely cares about the residents. You can tell she takes pride in her work and in helping people find the right home here.

Every time I’ve had a question or needed something, Natalie has gone out of her way to make sure it got handled quickly. It’s rare to find someone that attentive and friendly in property management.

If you’re looking for a great apartment in the RiNo area, I’d definitely recommend checking out Edison — and make sure to talk to Natalie. She’ll take great care of you.
reviews.response_text:
We sincerely value your feedback about Edison and Natalie's exceptional service. Thank you for recognizing our modern amenities and maintenance team. It's wonderful to hear that your experience at Edison at RiNo has been the best among the different apartments you've lived in throughout Denver. We take great pride in maintaining our clean, modern building and ensuring all our amenities remain in excellent condition for our residents' enjoyment.

We're particularly pleased that you've found our gym convenient and our common areas consistently spotless, as we work hard to provide usable amenities that truly enhance our residents' living experience. Your acknowledgment of our maintenance team being both fast and friendly means a great deal to us.

Natalie will be thrilled to read your kind words about her dedication to making the leasing process easy and stress-free. Her professional, helpful, and caring approach to resident services truly exemplifies the level of attention we strive to provide. We're proud to have team members like Natalie who go out of their way to handle residents' questions and needs quickly, and who genuinely take pride in helping people find their right home here at Edison.

Thank you for recommending Edison at RiNo and for highlighting Natalie's outstanding service to future residents in the RiNo area.

reviews.text: DO NOT MOVE HERE. We’ve lived in Edison at rhino for almost a year our neighbors called animal control on our dogs for barking when we were at work working and continue to harass us when we have not done ANYTHING to them. Our neighbors above us are also very noisy as well and we’ve not said a word or made a complaint. They have proceeded to mess with our rent prices but want to kiss ass and make excuses when addressed directly to their faces. A girl that was previously living here was pregnant and struggling to pay her rent and they put all her things out for people to get when they have a whole trash garage that they could’ve stored her stuff for her to come and get (I will pictures at the bottom to clarify.) The prices are expensive and it’s not even worth living around when people get stabbed downtown and you’re constantly being invaded by people. The elevator doesn’t even work sometimes and if it does you have to wait 10 minutes to get on it. There was also a girl living here with her boyfriend, and they proceeded to add drama into the relationship, causing them to break up. Do not let them know your business or what you have going on or they will do everything to start drama to make a show out of it for other residents. Honestly you’re better off getting a bigger apartment and something more peaceful. DO NOT APPLY A APPLICATION HERE THEY WILL RIG YOU.(if you do apply an application, make sure to ask the neighbors and the apartment complex they’re experience of living here.)

reviews.author: John Doll
reviews.text:
If you want an honest sample size for a review on this building, sort by lowest rating first. That’s where you’ll find honesty. If you’re a single woman with a pet, make sure you have a concealed carry permit before you sign your lease because you will be harassed and attacked by homeless people from the shelter next door on a daily basis.

The Edison has done a great job at hiring a customer centric staff to handle the first point of contact, initial walkthroughs, and any questions you may have about the property. These folks are very kind and friendly and they give you a warm fuzzy feeling about the Edison. Unfortunately, these are the same people you will be interfacing with when the garage is broke for months on end, or the elevators don’t work, or homeless people are smoking fentanyl in the stairwell you have to walk through to take your dog out because the elevators are broken. They maintain that same bubbly personality that drew you in initially while they unfortunately can’t resolve any of your issues because they’ve been trained to defer accountability to any and everyone but the Edison. The level of support they provide when you need a new home and haven’t signed a contract isn’t the same support you’ll get when the garage is broke for 6 months. Hard to tell if the fecal matter in the halls is from vagrants or peoples pets, but don’t stress…. The office staff will make sure the tour they give you bypasses all those stains while covertly navigating you around the stairwells will holes in the drywall and homeless people sleeping in stairwells. You will conveniently find cameras in common areas, but when you need surveillance footage from the “secured parking” area where all your windows are shattered in your paid parking spot, they won’t be able to assist. You’ll be guaranteed a new flyer with monthly activities (that are often misleading) and a cutesy pet of the month posting, but you might not be able to access your Amazon packages that were delivered 3 days ago while you were out of town because the package room was vandalized and they had to relocate everything until a contractor could correct the problem. This building isn’t brand new, so you won’t have to deal with the frustration of on site security and trash services being cut after you move in that were major reasons you signed a lease to begin with. The staff all have nice smiles, but are basically useless after you move in. They may greet you daily, but they don’t know how to resolve the faulty lighting fixture that’s been pulsing for months by the trash chute, but be reassured when you ask about the status of your complaint you will be reassured it’s a part on back order, not a maintenance issue.

If youre looking for adult dorms and an $1800 dollar studio with a bubbly staff that doesn’t know how to resolve actual issues but has a charming smile, this might be the place for you. If you prefer working elevators and secure parking look elsewhere, but if you want a front desk person with a nice smile and 0 follow though on any actual issues, this is the place for you.

And if youre looking for parking in the winter, avoid the water and poop drains overhead in the garage. They will burst and if you’re parked underneath, well that’s your problem.

With rents dropping across Denver, do your homework. You’ll be happier with a brand new building that hasn’t stripped all the amenities they needed to occupy the building initially. Also, watch out for the sketchy renewal that you’ll get at the end of your initial lease and put some holes in those walls too, because they aren’t returning your security deposit.
reviews.response_text:
Dear John,

I'm sorry to hear about your experience at Edison at RiNo. We hold ourselves to high standards and take feedback seriously when we fall short. We’d appreciate the opportunity to speak with you directly and see how we can make things right. Please feel free to contact us at (303) 732-5422. We look forward to hearing from you.

Thank you!

—Edison at RiNo Management Team

reviews.author: Brennan Little
reviews.text: My partner and I have been living here for nearly 6 months now and we are ridiculously happy with our choice to move here. The apartments are great and reasonably priced, the amenities are also very nice, and the staff is always super friendly (shoutout to Ben specifically). The location is absolutely stellar. About a 10 minute walk to Coors Field and there are great restaurants, bars, and breweries all within walking distance. The cherry on top though is that the staff does several events every month that are actually pretty awesome. For Oktoberfest they were handing out free beer, they’ve had several nights where they bring in a bartender for free cocktails, an event where you could trade random items with other residents if you wanted, different things for pets, etc. It is awesome. Just wanted to give this place the recognition it deserves.

The Edison At Rino

reviews.author: Julea Greenberg
reviews.text: Ben and Sawyer are the BEST. Schedule a tour with BEN and you’ll be sold. The building seems brand new, maintenance is so nice, quick and helpful and it really feels like everyone who works and lives here are friends. Love the location being on the edge of downtown, while having our own little neighborhood and walkable to larimer street. The pool is so pretty, very instagrammable, packages and mail are always secure, dog friendly building and walkable to a brand new dog park and sport court one block down. Grills and fire pits are always working and the leasing team puts in so much effort in fostering local relationships so we get discounts and perks at local hot spots. For example, free pancake day from snooze in the lobby, happy hour for residents at neighborhood bars and even hotel partnerships for when your family visits!! I  moved from out of state and had to find a place remotely and I’m so grateful I made the right decision. Living here is really best case scenario for wanting to live near hustle bustle but not right downtown, having a walking path right next to the river to enjoy beautiful Colorado days, walkable new clean dog park, and honestly a dorm feel because everyone is so friendly. The leasing office has made an amazing community here. 10/10 recommend
reviews.response_text:
Thank you for sharing your wonderful experience at The Edison At RiNo! We are thrilled to hear about your positive interactions with our team and the community.

Cheers,
Edison At RiNo

reviews.author: Caitlin T
reviews.text:
The apartments and amenities were amaaazing, I was very interested in them BUT what deterred me was the very very rude leasing agents.

I walked in and one leasing agent came and opened the door, said hello in a dry way, then said how his coworker would be helping us.
They must've thought we were dumb or not paying attention to them, because she was shaking her head no with a disgusted look on her face while he was smirking.

Don't know if it was us, or if they just hated their job, but either way it was extremely rude and offended us.
reviews.response_text:

Cheers,

The Edison At Rino

reviews.text: I absolutely love The Sloane. From my very first tour, I felt genuinely welcomed and have continued to feel well taken care of ever since. reviews.text:
I’ve really enjoyed living here. It’s a very comfortable place to call home. The building is well maintained, and the overall atmosphere feels calm and welcoming.

The staff is excellent — always friendly, professional, and quick to respond whenever something is needed. You can tell they genuinely care about keeping the building running smoothly and making residents feel supported.

One thing I appreciate is that they organize community events from time to time. It’s a nice touch that gives residents the opportunity to meet each other and creates a sense of community without feeling forced. It definitely contributes to a positive and friendly environment.

Overall, it’s been a great living experience. I would recommend it to anyone looking for a comfortable and well-managed place to live.

I had Pablo and Iqran installing the TV mount in my apartment. They were great, polite and left everything clean and in its place. Thanks !
I have only an issue about our METERGY bills. We're been overly charged since the beginning. We were told that the utilities would be around 80,100 ,120 the most for 2 people but since the 1st month was 190 and never came down, even going higher as 200.  I was away for a whole month, my husband works 14 to 15 hours daily, doesn't cook,  even though the usage kept the same. I complained 3 times, they asked to send a copy of my bills what I did but I never had any response about what's going on. I compared my bill with other couple they have almost a same usage as us and they're bill is about 50 dollars less than ours monthly. We are very annoyed by that. This experience is us very uncomfortable. I sent again, as requested,  for the third time my January bill of 202, 00cad to see if they find a mystery on this . Hope the management  can help us to fix this issue.
reviews.response_text:

reviews.author: Muhammad Ahmed Arif
reviews.text:
Amazing building, staff and amenities.
Just one issue: utilities service provider Metergy is highly unreliable and cryptic.
Amazing is the word that comes to mind when you think of sloane building,  staff and amenities.
Awful is the word that comes to mind when you get to know that metergy is managing utilities.  Check metergy reviews and on google you'll know what I am talking about.
With an already expensive building to live in metergy puts on an added pressure of what your utilities might be.
When we visited sloane we were told that our utilities will be around $100 mark but it has never been the case, our utilities for 1 bed have been considerably higher around $200 while we were not using any HVAC. Escalating issue to management of sloane didn't help resolve the issue. It was always we are working on it etc etc and never got any satisfactory response.
This experience kind of puts overall living experience at sloane a little stressful as you might not know what will be thrown at your face by the utilities provider.
I think sloane must bear responsibility of this since they chose metergy I didn't.
While we love the building, we are not comfortable with this metergy situation because when we moved here we solely based our decision based on what was told to us about utilities.
In my opinion, if you are unable to bear the constant mystery of what your utilities be, I don't think sloane is a good option for you but if that is not an issue, then it is the best building to be in.

reviews.author: Sar Ah
reviews.text: It was a long journey finding the right place, from dealing with agents, landlords, yet not getting basic services! Finally met Laura, Jack, everyone has been very friendly accommodating , it does make you feel like home, dont want to jinx it, no fire alarms or issues so far!

Sloane Team

reviews.author: Shail Patel
reviews.text:
This apartment community truly stands out for its exceptional service, beautiful construction, and welcoming atmosphere. The building itself is impressively designed, with a modern layout and high-quality construction that immediately leaves a strong impression. Words almost fall short when trying to praise how thoughtfully and well the building has been designed.

From the very beginning, the leasing process was handled with great professionalism. Leasing associate Ruby did an outstanding job—she consistently provided clear and detailed information, patiently answered repeated questions, and always responded with kindness and a warm attitude. Her dedication made the entire experience smooth and comfortable.

The concierge team—Priya, Lindsey, Yikanu, Mariam, and Claire—is always polite, approachable, and helpful, ensuring residents feel valued and supported at all times. The cleaning team maintains the building exceptionally well, keeping every corner spotless, while the security team is attentive and supportive, contributing to a safe and pleasant living environment.

Overall, the combination of excellent staff, outstanding service, and remarkable building design makes this apartment community an amazing place to live and highly recommended.
reviews.response_text:
Hello Shail,
 
Thank you for sharing such a thoughtful review. We’re delighted to hear that the quality of our design, service, and overall living experience has made a strong impression. It’s especially meaningful to know that Ruby and our concierge, cleaning, and security teams contributed to a seamless and welcoming experience. Creating a refined, well-supported community is central to our approach, and we truly appreciate your recommendation.
 
Sloane Team

reviews.author: Rosie M
reviews.text:
Sloane (Fitzrovia) has been the best rental experience I’ve had! When they say they’re elevating rental living, they mean it—bringing hotel living to life (it really does feel like the Tipton for any Family Channel friends!). Tas, our leasing agent, was so kind and accommodating and patient with updates my partner and I had.
Our concierge team: Priya, Lindsey, Mariam, Nina, Bereket, Yikanu, Jasmine…everyone has contributed to this elevated living experience. Their attention to detail and effort to bring luxury living to residents has come to fruition. Maintenance request? The team has responded to it immediately. Housekeeping team? Always friendly, smiling, and considerate. Security team? We always see them and they’re around supporting the safety of the building.
As much as I want to protect this little corner of the rental world, I cannot stop shouting from the rooftops of how blessed we have been to land a home at Sloane.
reviews.response_text:

Thank you so much for this truly incredible review! We’re absolutely thrilled to hear that your experience at Sloane has been the best rental experience you’ve had and that our vision of elevating rental living has come through in such a meaningful way. We love the “hotel living” (and Tipton!) comparison — that made our day!

Your kind words about Tas and our concierge team — Priya, Lindsey, Mariam, Nina, Yikanu, and Jasmine — mean so much to us. We’re incredibly proud of the dedication, care, and attention to detail our teams bring every day, and we’ll be sure to share your feedback with everyone you mentioned. We’re also glad to hear that maintenance and security have also contributed to making your home feel safe, welcoming, and well cared for.

Thank you for being part of the Sloane community and for sharing your experience so enthusiastically. We’re truly grateful to have you with us and look forward to continuing to provide you with exceptional service and elevated living.

Sloane Team

reviews.text: Awesome service by Mariam always helping and providing good advices
reviews.response_text:

If there’s anything else we can assist you with, we’re always here to help!

Sloane Team

reviews.author: Roni Sandrusi
reviews.text:
100/10! First of all what a beautiful building, what makes it even better is the amazing concierge team. Let me start with Priya the queen of events, Miriam the funniest gal, Claire the movie expert that helped me set up a camp rock movie night, and Lindsay who always has a smile on her face. The level of hospitality of these ladies is outstanding, makes me excited to come back home.

Thank you a million times! Never let them go, if anything maybe it’s time for a raise ?😉
reviews.response_text:
Hi Roni,

Thank you so much for this incredible feedback! We’re absolutely thrilled to hear how much you love the building and that our concierge team has made such a positive impact on your experience.

Priya, Miriam, Claire, and Lindsay will be over the moon to hear your kind words — they truly put their heart into what they do, and it means so much to see their hospitality recognized in such a thoughtful way. We’re glad they’ve helped make coming home something you look forward to.

Thank you again for taking the time to share this — it genuinely means a lot to all of us. We appreciate you!

Sloane Team

reviews.author: Rena Robinson
reviews.text: Loving living at Sloane! Moved in July 1 to a welcoming bow on our door, welcoming presents ($200 presto card , $100 10Dean  coffee/bar and more!!! ) And to a spectacular panoramic view of the city with fireworks exploding in every direction all night!!! Such a gorgeous  building with beautiful lounges and amenities!!!!  Feels like the most welcoming gorgeous resort with an exception staff!! Love our concierge team!!! We are always greeted  professionally, with a smile and they are so helpful to make everything perfect for us!!! Just no words to explain their wonderful! Thank you Priya and Bereket!!
reviews.response_text:
Hi Rena,

Thank you so much for sharing your review with us... and what a fantastic photo you've captured of the fireworks on the eve of your Move-In. We are thrilled you've had such a positive experience with us, and that our Concierge Team (Priya and Bereket, in particular!) have made your experience that much more special. We are so glad to have you in the community. If there's ever anything we can do to support you better, please let us know! 

Sloane Team

reviews.author: TS YES&HD Hobby
reviews.response_text:

Thank you for sharing your feedback with us! We appreciate your support.

Sloane Team

reviews.author: J Dos
reviews.text: No Balcony for any unit! What a joke and it's starts at $2700.  Do not rent from these billionair companies
reviews.response_text:
Hi J Dos,

Thank you for sharing your feedback. We’re sorry to hear about your frustration. While it’s true that majority of our suites do not include balconies in its layouts, we understand this feature is important to some residents. Our pricing reflects a range of other amenities, services, and building features..

We’d be happy to discuss your concerns further or provide more information about our suites with balconies and amenities if you’d like. Our goal is always to help prospective residents make the choice that’s right for them.

Thank you again for taking the time to share your thoughts.

Sloane Team

reviews.author: David D
reviews.text: They have a great team! They are attentive, efficient and super friendly! Appreciate the service and pleasant interaction with all of them. Your work is noticed, ladies! Thanks for all that you do.
reviews.response_text:
Hi David,

Thank you so much for your positive review. We are so pleased to hear our team's efforts are noticed and appreciated by our residents. We are so grateful to have you in our community!

Sloane Team

reviews.author: Lovely Losabe
reviews.text:
Madeleine is the best! ❤️ From day one, she’s been so helpful and supportive! Guiding us through the whole process, helping us with the documents, and answering every single question we had (and we had a lot! 😂). Even when she’s busy, she always finds time to reply with so much patience, kindness, and care. You can really tell she loves what she does and genuinely cares about helping people find their home.

We’re so thankful for her professionalism, positivity, and the way she made everything feel easy and stress-free. She truly made this experience exciting for us!

Also, a big thank you to Ruby for showing us the unit and explaining everything we needed to know about the building.

We’re so grateful to both of them and we honestly can’t wait to move in!
reviews.response_text:
Hi Lovely,

Thank you so much for your wonderful and detailed review! We’re thrilled to hear about your positive experience with Madeleine and Ruby, they truly are rockstars who care deeply about making every step of the leasing journey seamless and enjoyable. Your kind words mean the world to our team and perfectly reflect the dedication and passion they bring to helping our residents find their perfect home.

We’re so excited to welcome you into our community and can’t wait to make your move-in as smooth and memorable as possible. Here’s to the start of many great moments ahead. WELCOME HOME!

Sloane Team

reviews.author: Keke Beautiful
reviews.text: Madeleine is amazing!!!! She got me into my beautiful luxury apartment, I’m excited for this new chapter in my life, and can’t wait to try out all the amenities in the building😊😊😊😊

reviews.text: Big shoutout to Mariam, Priya, and Lindsey! They’ve made settling into the new building so much easier. Always welcoming, super helpful, and just great vibes all around. Couldn’t ask for a better front desk crew!

reviews.author: Kathit
reviews.text: Maddie showed us the building and our two preferred floor plans. Sloane looks like an amazing place to live, and Maddie is extremely helpful and accommodating. Ruby and Maddie also became our leading associates, and made the process of getting an apartment unit extremely smooth. Ruby facilitated our move in process and was so accommodating (she was flexible with changing times for booking the elevator too, which was super nice). The concierge team (Priya, Mariam and everyone else) has been extremely friendly and welcoming. They always are in a very cheerful mood. Thanks for all the help!
reviews.response_text:

She truly went above and beyond to ensure everything was handled smoothly and efficiently. I highly recommend her to anyone looking for an stress-free rental experience.

Sloane- this is definitely a high end rental building. Building and units are clean with lots of space and great amenities. Rent is really reasonable for the services offered.

reviews.author: Julyana Jacques-André-Coquin

Moved in last weekend, it’s not even a week in but we love it here! The amenities are very well designed, everything is brand new and tastefully decorated.

Tasneem and Laura were really attentive and caring for our move. They made sure everything was perfect for us and were very helpful. On site team is really lovely and always welcoming. reviews.author: Vania Aniq
reviews.text:
Moved to Sloane about a month ago and it has been an amazing experience so far.

From signing the lease, Maddie was a delight to work with constantly in communication with me, keeping me updated on any roadblocks and helping me navigate them she was fantastic.

And the concierge team are also amazing. Always so helpful, always smiling. They even ran to my help when I had an issue with my dog being able to unlock the front door and get out. Also they are always so friendly with my dog, always greeting him and playing with him.

Also the maintenance team is amazing. You put in a work order and it is completed within 2 hours. They are amazing, always making sure that you are well taken care of.

I would say it has been an amazing experience to be living here. Can’t wait to see what other events they have planned which honestly have been the highlight of living here. The movie night and the games night. There is always something to do
reviews.response_text:
Hi Vania,

Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience! reviews.author: RJ
reviews.text:
We’ve been living here for 2 months, and love it!

Pros:
- The staff is fantastic: Ruby, Tas, Bereket, Mariam, Priya, and Lindsay are always super helpful and friendly.
- The cleaning staff do an amazing job keeping everything fresh and spotless.
- Amenities are modern and well-maintained. Sometimes other tenants don’t put things back in the gym, but the staff consistently keeps it clean.
- Events are a highlight! Whoever came up with this deserves a raise. They’re always fun and a great way to connect with neighbors. Big shoutout to Mariam and Priya for hosting and putting their heart and soul into them.
- Tenants are friendly, which makes living here even better.

Cons:
- The east and west towers are still under construction, so it can be a bit noisy at times.
- I wish tenants had access to a garden hose for washing cars. There is one on-site, but it’s not available for residents.

We've had a really positive experience so far and are excited to keep calling this place home!
reviews.response_text:
Hi RJ,

Thank you for sharing such a thoughtful review! We’re delighted to hear you’ve had such a positive experience these past two months and that our team members — Ruby, Tas, Bereket, Mariam, Priya, and Lindsay have made such a great impression. It’s also wonderful to know you’re enjoying the cleanliness, amenities, and especially the community events.

We appreciate your feedback about the construction noise and garden hose access and we are thankful for your patience and understanding on this matter. We’re so glad you feel at home here and look forward to continuing to make your living experience even better!

Sloane Team

reviews.author: Chisom Osuiwu
reviews.text:
I officially moved into Sloane on August 31st, and honestly, I couldn’t be happier with my decision. But before I talk about my move-in experience, I want to take it back to the very beginning—when I first showed interest in making Sloane my new home.
I discovered Ruby, the leasing agent, on TikTok, and from that very first interaction, I could tell she was going to make the whole process easy and smooth. Ruby has been nothing short of amazing—kind, patient, understanding, and incredibly helpful every step of the way.
She took her time during my tour, never rushed me, and made sure I understood everything about the lease agreements and the building. What stood out to me the most is that Ruby went above and beyond—she even helped me measure the rooms in my apartment so I wouldn’t have to make an extra trip. That little act of care saved me time and stress, and it showed how thoughtful she truly is. Even after I officially moved in, Ruby continued to check in on me, which made me feel welcomed and cared for. Talking to her feels familiar and genuine, like chatting with a friend. Ruby, you are a gem, and I’m so grateful for everything you’ve done!
Moving in can sometimes feel overwhelming, but thanks to the maintenance team, the process was so much smoother than I expected. Jonathan, in particular, was an absolute lifesaver. He helped me with so many things around my apartment during my move-in. He always checked in with me, asked if there was anything I needed mounted or adjusted, and never hesitated to go the extra mile. His patience and kindness really stood out to me. Having someone like Jonathan as part of the Sloane team truly made such a difference—it felt like I had extra support during a time that can usually feel so stressful.
I also want to thank Pablo and Iqram for their help with mounting my TVs. They came right on time, handled everything so professionally, and made sure I didn’t have to worry about a thing. Their efficiency and friendliness didn’t go unnoticed—I really appreciated it.
Priya has also been a huge help since day one. She is incredible at what she does—you would think she’s been working at Sloane for years with the way she effortlessly handles situations and finds solutions. She’s always available when I need help, always communicates clearly, and makes sure everything is handled smoothly. Priya has truly made a difference in my move-in experience, and I can’t thank her enough.
Now, the concierge team—what can I say? They are truly the heart of this building. Mariam, Lindsey, Nina, and Bareket are the warmest, most welcoming people. From the very beginning, they’ve gone out of their way to make me feel at home. They don’t just greet me at the desk—they check in, offer help with heavy items, and are always happy to stop for a conversation. I’m usually not someone who enjoys small talk, but with them, it’s different. They’re genuine, funny, and enthusiastic, and chatting with them honestly brightens my day. It’s rare to find people in this industry who bring such warmth and authenticity to their role, and they make Sloane feel more than just a building—it feels like home.
Security also deserves recognition. Knowing there’s always a friendly, welcoming team present 24/7 gives me so much peace of mind. They are approachable, professional, and reassuring, which adds an extra layer of comfort and safety to living here.
To wrap everything up, I just want to say how much I truly love living at Sloane. The building itself is beautiful, but what really makes this place stand out is the people. From the leasing process to move-in and now settling into daily life, the staff here have made all the difference. They treat residents with kindness, patience, and respect, and that’s something you can’t always find.
If you’re considering moving into Sloane and have any doubts or second thoughts, this place is worth it. Not only will you find a beautiful space to live in, but you’ll also find a community of people who genuinely care. I’m so grateful to call Sloane home, and I couldn’t recommend it more highly.
reviews.response_text:
Hi Chisom,

Thank you so much for your detailed review. To start, we are so happy to hear you had such a positive experience with our leasing associate, Ruby. We understand how important it is to ensure our future residents to feel welcomed, heard, understood, and never rushed. We are thrilled to hear all the great experiences and interactions you had with our maintenance and concierge team. The site team takes pride in our residents experience therefore, if there is anything we can do to make our residents lives easier, we will always try to make it happen. Please don't hesitate to reach out to our team, we are always happy to support! Thank you for choosing Sloane to be your home and highly recommending us, your word means a lot. We are so happy to have you in our community and cannot wait for all the memorable experience that are yet to come!

Sloane Team

reviews.author: Faith Apolskis
reviews.text:
Moved into my unit in October '25 and I have nothing but wonderful things to say about my entire experience so far!

During my initial tour, Patrick was just wonderful to work with! He answered all my questions and helped me apply on the spot. Before move-in, Patrick, Micaela, and Joshua in the front office allowed me to move my move-in date with no issues and rushed to clean my unit after the old tenant moved out so it was in great shape for me to move-in. It was such a great experience i even extended my lease before move-in day! The garage is gated and i've yet to see the gate break down (my old complex had gate issues every other day), there's plenty of parking, and I've seen private security walking the garage overnight!

Since I've moved in, i've had a couple maintenance "issues" (regular apartment stuff) that the maintenance team has gone ABOVE & BEYOND for! My requests are reviewed same-day and either resolved or addressed by the next day. Amir is responsive, knowledgeable, and exactly who you want to help you with any surprise maintenance needs! Just, the best!

The *only* thing I'll say to be aware of is if you're living on the east side or close to downtown, you have to be prepared for some acts of vandalism (as you do in most cities). There's only been one instance of vandalism in our garage since my move-in but even then, the front office team handled it wonderfully! They sent out an email alerting tenants, immediately hired daytime security, and even helped my friend check on my car as I was out of town when this occurred.

A long review to say, i would definitely recommend living here or anywhere this team manages! Thank you!

reviews.author: Fabian Fernandez
reviews.text:
I’ve lived at 7East for 7 years and continue to be impressed with the way this community takes care of its residents. Recently, my entire sink collapsed unexpectedly, and the maintenance team handled the situation with urgency and professionalism. Amir came by the very next day to assess the issue and immediately coordinated a contractor to get everything repaired.

Not only did they install a brand-new sink, but they also replaced the entire floor in the area which had a bit of water damage, and the work was done quickly and with great attention to detail. Throughout the whole process, Amir checked in, communicated clearly, and made sure everything was resolved to a high standard.

The level of service here has always been consistent, and this experience is just another example of why I’ve chosen to stay at 7East for so long. Big shoutout to Amir for going above and beyond. His professionalism, kindness, and follow-through truly make a difference. Highly recommend living here!

reviews.author: Baylee Sivils
reviews.text: Moved in recently and have had such a positive experience so far.  Patrick made my leasing/move-in process so seamless and has been extremely kind! I had a few maintenance issues upon move-in that Amir addressed swiftly- he’s super knowledgeable and eager to help!

reviews.author: Luke Page
reviews.text:
I really enjoyed living at 7East. Great location, solid unit quality, and a very fair price. I would have stayed longer if a larger unit had been available to transfer into.

The standout here is the staff. I’ve lived in plenty of apartments, and this team is among the best I’ve encountered—professional, responsive, and kind. Micaela sold me on the community during my initial tours and remained personable and supportive after move‑in; the rest of the team was consistently great too. The property itself isn’t flashy, and yes, things occasionally break, but the staff’s attitude and follow‑through made me feel issues were handled as well as possible.

Overall: Strong value, excellent service, and a smooth living experience.

reviews.author: Luke C
reviews.text: The maintenance team has been excellent, always prompt, professional, and efficient with service requests. Issues are addressed quickly and thoroughly, and communication is clear throughout the process. It makes a noticeable difference knowing requests are handled reliably and with care.

reviews.author: Yernar Abdikakhar
reviews.text: Brando came on time, quickly found the problem, and fixed the light fast. Very professional and friendly

reviews.author: Rabia Abbasi
reviews.text: Brian helped me move and I will say he is amazing! Sorted out all my concerns and allotted me my dream space!

reviews.author: Willie Rojas
reviews.text:
I’ve been going on living here for three years and the new management is no help or unresponsive.  Also when you need maintenance done, they do not replace or fix things with what you had before.  We are supposed to have smart switches but mine went out and they replaced it with a regular switch.  This can be a small issue but when you are charge an internet/smart package it becomes an issue.  You are paying for a service that as time goes buy you are not able to use anymore.  Why have an app when you cannot manage your lights.  Only thing it’s good for is to open your door without having to use your key.
I will be looking for a new place to live.  I love my apt but with this new management it has made it hard to live here.

reviews.author: Kritika Taparia
reviews.text: Clean and well-maintained apartment in a prime location. The facilities are great and everything is easily accessible nearby. Overall, a very comfortable place to live—highly recommend!

reviews.author: Ben
reviews.text:
Block 44 is a wonderful property. It’s very clean and has a modern feel to it. I love the location that it is so close to everything you want to do downtown.

Amanda, the manager, is so kind and responsible.  She’s on top of everything and keeps this place running like a well oiled machine. She’s always happy to see me and makes Block 44 feel like home.

And Brian is amazing at the front desk! He always has a smile on his face. He’s so welcoming and eager to help.  He represents Block 44 wonderfully.

This staff is terrific. I can only imagine that all of their attention and hard work and dedication are recognized and appreciated by their superiors.

I wonder if a Christmas raise for each of them might not help ensure that this property always has such glowing representation!
reviews.response_text: Ben, thank you for saying so! We appreciate the positive feedback very much.

reviews.author: Everett Freeman
reviews.text: I live here. The spot is ok i guess but whenever I need handyman help the service is amazing. Brando just fixed my light and he’s so friendly and very quick and professional!
reviews.response_text: Everett, thanks for saying so!

reviews.author: Lindsey Webb
reviews.text: We have enjoyed living here at Block 44! Shout out to our awesome maintenance guy, Brando, is the nicest and is so quick to come and help with any problems we have had!
reviews.response_text: Lindsey, I'm glad that you're enjoying living here. Brando and the rest of the team are happy to have you!

reviews.author: Sammy's Heating & Air
reviews.text: Great apartment community and Amanda and Brando are always so on top of things!

reviews.author: Matthew Nelson
reviews.text: We stayed at an Airbnb unit and the hosts and accommodations were amazing.  The views from the apartment and balcony were perfect. 5 stars for the unit and our stay in the unit.  But,  the smell in the hallways and common areas were unbearable!  I had to hold my breath when walking through.  No air circulation …only spraying a horrible masking overcoat of stank.  The hallways were dirty and trash was allowed to be in the hallway at anytime (gross).  Litter in the garage was there for 4 days untouched…it is probably still there.  This place needs to step it up.  I know college kids probably live here and don’t care but the smell in the common areas (halls, workout room, shared tv meeting rooms) is HORRIBLE!

reviews.author: Addison Aldous
reviews.text: What a fun paint night! Big thanks to Amanda, Kai, and Angel! You girls are the best!

reviews.author: Kathleen Donnelly
reviews.text: This place is amazing I love it!!!

reviews.author: Stephanie
reviews.text: Sunny is absolutely wonderful! She is always so kind, attentive, and helpful every time I stop by. She truly goes above and beyond to make residents feel welcome and taken care of. Block 44 is lucky to have her!
reviews.response_text: Thank you so much for your kind words about Sunny! We’re delighted to hear how much you appreciate her kindness and attentiveness. She truly cares about creating a welcoming environment for our residents, and your feedback means a lot. We’re lucky to have her on our team, and even luckier to have residents like you who make our community so special!

reviews.author: Matt Castleberry
reviews.response_text: Thank you for the 5-star rating! We’re so glad to know you’re enjoying your experience with us.

reviews.author: Julian Hodge
reviews.response_text: Thank you for the 5-star rating! We’re so glad to know you’re enjoying your experience with us.

reviews.author: B Dedricks
reviews.text: Block 44 is one of my favorite locations, not just because of the location/building but because of the staff! Sunny is the CM/PM there and is the crème de la creme! Very attentive and helpful, super responsive, down to earth manager. They have an amazing team there!
reviews.response_text: Thank you for taking the time to share such kind words! We’re thrilled to hear that you’re enjoying both the community and the team at Block 44. Sunny and the staff truly strive to provide attentive, responsive, and supportive service, and it’s wonderful to know that their efforts have made such a positive impact. We’re grateful to have you as part of our community!

reviews.author: Oc Psy
reviews.text:
I’ve had a great experience with Block 44 Apartments. The property is well-maintained, modern, and has excellent amenities like the gym, pool, and parking garage that make living here super convenient. The location is also great, close to downtown and everything you need.

The management team is professional, responsive, and truly cares about residents. Anytime I’ve had a question or needed help, they’ve handled it quickly and with a great attitude. You can tell they put effort into keeping the community safe and welcoming.

Overall, Block 44 has been an amazing place to live and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a comfortable, upscale apartment in Salt Lake City.
reviews.response_text:
Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We’re thrilled to hear that you’ve had such a positive experience at Block 44. Our team takes pride in maintaining a modern community with amenities that make life convenient and enjoyable, so it’s great to know you’re loving the gym, pool, and parking garage.

We’re especially glad that our management team has been able to support you with quick, friendly service—we truly value our residents and want everyone to feel at home here. Thank you for recommending Block 44, and for being a part of our community!

reviews.author: Xuanyi .Z
reviews.response_text: Thank you for the 5 star review!! We appreciate you as our valued resident!

reviews.author: Jim C
reviews.text:
Stayed 9 nights through Marriott Vacations — unfortunately, I wouldn’t return.
The property fell short in several key areas. The walls are extremely thin — I could hear footsteps from the room above throughout the day and night, and every night around midnight, someone in the hallway had loud phone conversations that continued despite me asking them to lower their voice.

Road noise is constant, and the view from my room was of a vacant parking lot that felt unsafe, with visible signs of homelessness and people sleeping on the pavement. The adjacent 7-Eleven has a flashing blue security light and a voice-activated “no loitering” announcement that goes off frequently, adding to the discomfort.

The room itself was passable but felt cheaply furnished. I had looked forward to relaxing by the pool, but the hot tub jets didn’t work, the furniture was dirty and neglected, and the main pool had visible dirt at the bottom — clearly not maintained regularly.

I’ve included photos to show the reality, which is far from what the listing portrayed. I travel to Salt Lake City often for work and had hoped this could be a go-to spot for future stays, but based on this experience, I won’t be returning.

reviews.author: Josh Rios
reviews.text: I toured here on Thursday! I’m honestly impressed with the amount of amenities they have! The office staff was very friendly and eager to help. Their model unit felt so comfy. Definitely one of my top places on the list!
reviews.response_text: Thank you for touring with us and for the amazing feedback! We're so glad you enjoyed the amenities and felt comfortable in the model unit—that’s exactly the experience we hope to create. Our team takes pride in being welcoming and helpful, and we’re excited to hear we made a great impression. Let us know if you have any follow-up questions—we’d love to welcome you to the community!

reviews.author: Mason Farris
reviews.text: I lived at Block 44 in 2024 and was very pleased with the location and quality of my apartment. It's walking distance to many of my favorite downtown spots and so much great food! I only moved out because I had to leave the state for a new job. I would always consider moving back into these apartments.
reviews.response_text: Thank you so much for sharing your experience! We’re glad to hear you enjoyed your time at Block 44 and that the location and apartment quality made a great impression. It’s always tough to say goodbye to residents like you, but we wish you all the best in your new role and hope to welcome you back if you ever return to the area. You’ll always have a home here at Block 44!

reviews.author: Yong Wang
reviews.text: My son lived in Block 44 for 6 months and moved out in March 2025. Till today (5/1/2025), we have not received our security deposit yet. I kept calling them and was told that they changed management company and I need to call GreyStar directly. I was given a phone number and till today nobody answered or returned phone calls .  At this moment, I have no idea how to get my security deposit back. This is the first time, I have experience this . Question: am I the only one having this experience with Block 44?

reviews.author: Evan Reed
reviews.text: Stayed here in an Airbnb. Area is in a great location with an easy commute to downtown. we hardly had to use our vehicle, and we could just walk or use the Lime scooters.

reviews.text:

Management is absolutely terrible here. Do not move here.

If there's anything else you'd like to share, please don't hesitate to contact us directly. Thank you for letting us know about this. We'll use your comments to improve how we work, so we can ensure this doesn't happen again at Block 44.

reviews.text:

Worst moving experience I've ever had. The management are terrible and take no responsibility. Cindy in particular was the worst. She showed zero empathy.

reviews.text: I really enjoyed living here; this has been one of the best apartments I’ve lived in. Even though this place is in downtown, it’s pretty quiet most of the time.
