I got to live in a 1-bedroom and in a studio.
reviews.response_text: Hi Isaac, thank you for your 5-star review! We surely miss having you as a part of our community. We hope you are having a great start to 2025!

reviews.author: Adriana Vargas
reviews.text: Block44 has been a dream for me as a remote worker! The complex has a quiet, relaxed environment with coworking spaces and reliable internet, so working from home has been a breeze. I love being able to take breaks by the pool or in the gym without ever having to leave the building. The apartments are well soundproofed, so it’s easy to focus and get work done without distractions. The management team is friendly and responsive, making the whole experience stress-free. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a home that supports both work and relaxation!
reviews.response_text: Adriana Vargas, we are so pleased you're enjoying your experience at Block 44!

reviews.author: ACC2
reviews.text: I’ve absolutely loved living at Block44! The apartments are spacious with large windows, so there’s plenty of natural light, making it feel warm and inviting. The staff is also amazing and always ready to help. If you’re looking for a peaceful, nature-friendly community to call home, I’d highly recommend it!

reviews.text: I've really enjoyed my time living at Block44. The apartments are spacious, well-designed, and have a cozy, modern feel. Maintenance requests are handled quickly, which makes a big difference, and the management team is super attentive and helpful. I love the community vibe here—neighbors are friendly, and there’s a sense of community that’s rare to find. The complex is also quiet and peaceful, which makes it a great place to unwind after a busy day. Overall, a great place to live!
reviews.response_text: A V, your satisfaction is our top priority. Our team strives to deliver an excellent experience, and are glad you found this to be the case during your time at Block 44. If you have further needs or questions, please reach out!

reviews.author: WalterRRS
reviews.text: I’ve had an amazing experience living at Block44! The property is well-maintained, and the amenities are fantastic – from the modern gym to the relaxing pool area, there’s everything you need. The staff is incredibly friendly and responsive; they truly go above and beyond to ensure residents are comfortable. The location is convenient with easy access to shops, restaurants, and public transport. Plus, the community feels safe and welcoming, which is a huge bonus. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a great place to call home!
reviews.response_text: Walterrrs - thanks for your lovely comments about our team. We'll be sure to let them know they went Beyond Expectations!

reviews.author: Sebastian Hermosilla
reviews.text: Living at Block44 has exceeded my expectations in every way! The units are beautifully designed and feel incredibly comfortable, making it easy to settle in and feel at home right away. The community amenities are top-notch, with everything from a state-of-the-art fitness center to cozy common areas where residents can relax or work. What really stands out is the welcoming atmosphere; both the staff and neighbors are friendly, making it feel like a true community. The management team is proactive and always ready to help, which has made my experience here stress-free. Highly recommend to anyone seeking a well-rounded and supportive community to call home!
reviews.response_text: Sebastian Hermosilla, your review about Block 44 made our day! Thanks so much for taking the time to write.

reviews.author: Steven Mccombs
reviews.text: Block44 is truly a gem! From the moment I moved in, I’ve been impressed by the luxury and attention to detail throughout the complex. The apartments are stunning, with high-quality finishes, spacious layouts, and plenty of natural light. The amenities are incredible – the pool feels like a resort, the gym is fully equipped, and there are even great spaces for gatherings and events. The staff is always friendly and goes above and beyond to ensure residents have everything they need. It’s been a wonderful experience living here, and I’d highly recommend it to anyone looking for a high-end, hassle-free living experience!
reviews.response_text: Steven Mccombs, we're so glad that we were able to go above and beyond your expectations! We appreciate you and thank you for taking the time to give us a great review.

reviews.author: Lixmer Rivas
reviews.text: Block44 has been a fantastic place to live! The location is perfect – close to everything I need, from grocery stores to dining options, and commuting has been a breeze. The apartments themselves are bright and modern, with great finishes that make it feel like home. One of the best parts has been the peaceful atmosphere and beautifully landscaped grounds, making it feel like a little oasis. The management and maintenance teams are also responsive and truly care about the residents. Highly recommend for anyone looking for convenience, comfort, and quality living!

reviews.author: Julia Kai
reviews.text: Love living here! amenities are amazing and the office team is the best I have ever experienced in a apartment complex. They truly care about the residents in this building.
reviews.response_text: Julia - You're the best! We really appreciate the positive review!

reviews.author: Saber 42
reviews.text: I stayed here for a air B&B I got to the apartment on a Tuesday there were sings saying future resident parking 2 hour max I park and had to go get the room key and garage opener the next day my I had family come that was also staying there with us they parked in the 2 hour parking while we took there stuff to the room and got settled while this was happening the apartment had our car towed we had not been there for even one hour. This place also is very trashy while walking through the hallways it looks like a cheap $30 Vegas motel there were stains every few feet across the entire floor the walls were not remotely sound proof we heard everything don’t go here
reviews.response_text:
Hello,

We are sorry to hear your experience at Block 44 was less than excellent. If you stayed at our property using the service of one of our authorized corporate lease holders, please reach out to them to see if they can further assist you. We are always happy to discuss any concerns with you as well. Feel free to call us at 801.456.1404 or email block44@greystar.com.

reviews.author: Anna Quintero
reviews.text:
After living here for a year I am shocked that this apartment complex doesn’t have more bad reviews. I can only assume it wasn’t always this bad. I’ve lived in lots of similar style apartments complex’s and while they all have their issues I have never lived somewhere with this many problems. I rely a lot on reviews when looking for apartments so here’s some things I wish I would’ve been aware of prior to signing a lease.

- Be sure to ask for your actual total monthly fees. My one bedroom was about $450 more than the listed rent with all fees included. (This does not include utilities)
- The shared spaces are often not maintained and unusable. (A glass table top from the courtyard flew into my window and shattered I promptly alerted the staff and was ignored. 8 months later the courtyard was still covered in shattered glass, you’ll pay a fee for the package room but it will rarely be in working order, the coffee machine is also not maintained and usually doesn’t actually have any coffee in it)
- The hallways smell ungodly bad most of the time and valet trash is so particular that it’s easier to just take out your own trash even though you’re paying for valet.
- Lots of the units are Airbnbs making it feel like living in a hotel. I was constantly getting approached by vacationers who are lost or locked out or can’t figure out parking.
- My sink and shower were constantly clogged and I had to keep fixing it myself because maintenance never came.
- They seem to have intermittent issues with the fire alarms because they will go off for seemingly no reason and stay on for long periods of time.
- Police don’t have access to the building which became a problem when physical fights are happening in the hallway.
- They hand out evictions like candy. In my 1 year there 3 of the units in my hall alone received eviction notices myself included. My autopay bounced once due to some fraud on my account. I didn’t receive any kind of notice that it didn’t go through and when I logged onto my portal it said the payment was processed. 3 days later I received an eviction notice along side some hefty fees. The staff didn’t contact me directly when the payment bounced and was incredibly unprofessional when handling this situation.
- The key fob system once broke leaving me locked out of my apartment for an entire day.
- My last month there was only a few days and instead of charging me the $200 prorated amount that I was supposed to pay they charged me 2k and took over a month to refund my money.
- Upon move out they do charge you for additional cleaning even if you leave the apartment cleaner than when you moved in and definitely don’t hang anything on your walls unless you don’t need your deposit back.

The units themselves are pretty nice but not worth the stress and there’s other comparable apartments around that are managed much better.
reviews.response_text:
Hi Anna,

Here at Block 44 we place the highest priority on our resident satisfaction. We are extremely disappointed to hear that your experience was anything less than what we strive for.  While we appreciate all types of feedback, we are perplexed by the items you mentioned as we feel they are unwarranted and need to be addressed. 

Being dishonest about pricing wouldn’t benefit us in any way. We are proudly transparent about costs at the time of touring. We provide pricing sheets that break down any and all pricing associated with living at our community.

Many of your concerns revolved around maintenance and the upkeep of the property. We have an extremely talented maintenance team that keeps the property in pristine condition. They handle all requests in a prompt manner, most times completing work orders the same day the request is submitted, as is true for the requests that were submitted during your residency with us.

We would love the opportunity to address each and every item that your mentioned by speaking with you directly. We are firm believers that feedback is an always an opportunity for improvement. Although your time at Block 44 may have concluded, we don’t ever want the experience to end negatively. Please feel free to reach out to us at 801-456-1404, or email block44@greystar.com.

reviews.author: Morgan W
reviews.text: I usually don’t leave reviews but I lived here for two years and thought this would be helpful to those looking for a place to live. The first year I lived here everything was great and would have given it four or five stars. The second year is when staff and management changed in the office frequently. Gabriel has always been great to work with and has been helpful, but other staff not so much. The valet trash is picky with the type and size of bags you use. The gym has good options but the equipment is rarely cleaned. The elevators usually have dirty floors and haven’t been cleaned as frequently as they used to. The hallways have air fresheners all around to cover over any odors, which is almost too strong and causes me to sneeze. The pool, hot tub, gym, and the clubhouse were pros to living here. The hot tub rarely ever has been closed. The maintenance team here is amazing and responsive. They respond to requests within 24 hours or so. Unfortunately, just like any other apartment, you can hear your neighbors walking above you and you can hear your downstairs neighbors when they blast music after hours. The leasing office ignored the email I sent them about loud music after hours and I had to deal with it until I moved out. There are a lot of airbnbs in this complex as well. When I moved into my apartment, it was not deep cleaned and I had to clean it myself to how I wanted. I had a clogged bathroom sink when I moved in. When I moved out, I made sure to deep clean my apartment to make sure I wasn’t charged for anything. When I got my deposit back, they only gave us 1/4 back from our deposit due to cleaning and painting. When I emailed the office regarding this, they did not respond or give any further explanation. I give block44 2.5 stars but I’ll be generous and give them 3.
reviews.response_text: Hi Morgan, we definitely loved having you at our community! We are sorry we didn't meet your expectations to get a 5-star review. We are grateful for the feedback and will make sure to address these issues to improve our resident experience. Thank you again for choosing Block 44 as your home!

reviews.response_text: Holly Mckeeth Heal, your review about Block 44 made our day! Thank you!

reviews.author: Rachel Ro Bear
reviews.response_text: Thank you for sharing your experience with Aspire 7th & Grant, Rachel!

reviews.author: Reverie K
reviews.text: Beautiful property! The management staff answered all the questions I had with knowledgeable kindness.
reviews.response_text: Thank you for your kind words Reverie!  We are always happy to help with any questions!

reviews.author: Joy Carletti
reviews.text: Phenomenal building that is secure, *pet-friendly* and has just the best community space. You can sit there for hours and work while you drink in great views, comfy couches, and the convenience of a conference room. Makes WFH seem much more official when you need it to, and feel far more relaxing when you need it to!
reviews.response_text: Hello Joy!  We are so glad you are enjoying the lounge area!  We are always here if there's anything we can do to make the space more useful for your work from home needs.

reviews.author: Devan Meck
reviews.text: The leasing team here is amazing. Chloe has always been kind and helpful with all of my questions.
reviews.response_text: Thank you so much for your feedback, Devan!  We are always here to help should you ever have more!

reviews.author: Sierra Smurlolee
reviews.response_text: Thank you for your feedback Sierra!  We're happy to help and glad that you have enjoyed your time here!

reviews.author: Austin Card
reviews.text:
My experience as Aspire has been fantastic from start to finish.

A big thank you to the team for their exceptional support throughout my time there—they truly went above and beyond to make the experience top notch.

The apartments and building/amenities were modern, well-maintained, and in an ideal location, making it a wonderful place to call home. I’m grateful for the amazing team and would highly recommend Aspire 7th and Grant to anyone considering living there!
reviews.response_text: Hi Austin, Thank you for the kind words and recommendation! We are always happy to hear that we are delivering on our commitment to create a wonderful place to live.

reviews.author: Erin Arick
reviews.text: Great leasing team!!! Made the process super smooth and answer every single question. I worked with Tommy and he was awesome. Thanks team!
reviews.response_text: Thanks for your feedback Erin!  We're so glad Tommy was able to make your move-in process as stress-free as possible. If you ever need anything we're here for you!

reviews.author: Sappskull
reviews.text: I’m so happy to have Brian, the maintenance supervisor, back in the building! He does an amazing job, and it’s great to have him here again!
reviews.response_text: We are excited to have Brian back too!  He's leading a great maintenance team and we are here for you should you need anything.  Thanks for leaving your feedback!

reviews.author: Will Kos (Will)
reviews.text: Sleek and clean building with great views of the city and mountains! Staff members are all so helpful and friendly and the amenities are great! Brian and Michael in maintenance are quick and thorough. Tommy and Chloe in the office are also very helpful whenever I need them.
reviews.response_text:
Thank you Will, We're glad your experience has been so positive at Aspire 7th & Grant. Our team takes pride in providing remarkable customer service for our residents. We look forward to serving you for many more years to come!
Cheers,
The Aspire Team

reviews.author: Havilande Lodge
reviews.text: Incredible and professional staff! I couldn’t recommend them enough!
reviews.response_text: Thank you for your kind words! We appreciate your feedback and are excited to keep providing exceptional service for you and all our residents!

reviews.author: Dave Nelson
reviews.response_text: Thank you for your feedback Dave. We are sorry that your experience with Aspire did not meet your expectations. We are not able to find you in our system as a resident, but would love the opportunity to help if we can. Please feel free to reach out to our team at AspireLeasing@kairoi.com if there is anything we can address to improve your experience.

reviews.author: Lloyd McKenzie
reviews.text: Great support throughout!
reviews.response_text: Thank you for your review, Lloyd Mckenzie! We're glad to hear you had a great experience with our support at Aspire 7th & Grant.

reviews.author: Jay E
reviews.text: I don’t usually write reviews, but I wanted to share my experience at Aspire. The office staff, especially Chloe and Tommy, are fantastic, and the maintenance team works hard to keep everything looking great. What really stood out was how quickly Brian, the maintenance supervisor, responded to my work order. I submitted the request, and within five minutes, he was at my door, ready and happy to help. Thank you Aspire!!
reviews.response_text: We greatly appreciate your feedback, Jay E! We strive to provide that level of quick response every day and are happy that it made your day a little easier!

reviews.author: Vanessa Thurk
reviews.text: Great units and fun area. Staff is great but difficult to get a hold of. When I arrived to get my keys, I had to call multiple times to be let into the leasing office (which apparently remains locked and unattended). The difficulty reaching staff is concerning as the garage door has been left open, on and off the past few days. This is a security concern.
reviews.response_text:
Thank you for your feedback, Vanessa!  We are sorry it took several calls to get us on your move-in date. The front doors are kept locked for security and our team is available to unlock them from 10am to 6pm on weekdays and 10am-5pm on Saturdays. Although, occasionally we may be away from our desks on a tour or assisting another resident. We also take garage safety seriously. Our garage door was recently malfunctioning but we have completed all repairs and it is fully functional again! In addition, we have security that patrols the property and garages nightly to enhance the safety at Aspire. 
If you have any questions or concerns our office is here for you! Please let us know if there's anything else we can do to help you settle into your new apartment!

reviews.author: Nini E
reviews.text: This place is amazing quiet, great neighbors and office staff are very friendly and professional. Also maintenance is quick to respond and very efficient. Brian E. the new manager is also really friendly I appreciate his hard work in maintaining the building and being so quick to respond to any request we put in.
reviews.response_text: We are delighted to hear about your positive experience at Aspire 7th & Grant. Thank you for sharing your feedback!

reviews.author: Courtney Livingston
reviews.text: Chloe and Tommy have been a huge help throughout my time living here. Chloe even helped me jump my car! Tim who helps with maintenance is wonderful and the amenities/hallways/elevator are always kept clean and fresh. I have loved living here. It is an AMAZING location and a great building for dogs. I'm moving out now but wish I could stay. Thank you again to the entire team. <3
reviews.response_text: Hi Courtney, We're happy to hear that you've enjoyed your time at Aspire 7th & Grant. Thank you for your kind words about Chloe, Tommy, and Tim. We love hearing that our work has been a help! While we're sad to see you go, we're all excited for your next chapter. Have a great summer!

reviews.author: RG E
reviews.text:
I moved into my new home two months ago and recently made my first service request. I was impressed when Brian, the maintenance supervisor, arrived at my door less than two hours later. His quick response and friendly demeanor were remarkable. It's refreshing to experience such efficient and courteous service.
Thank you!!
reviews.response_text: We're glad to hear about your positive experience with Brian's attention to your work order. Thank you for sharing your feedback - we will be sure to let him know!

reviews.author: Ky Tomkus
reviews.response_text: We are glad to hear about your 5-star experience! Thank you for choosing Aspire 7th & Grant.

reviews.author: Ashley Elizabeth
reviews.response_text: We are glad to hear about your 5-star experience! Thank you for choosing Aspire 7th & Grant.

reviews.author: Katherine McClintock
reviews.response_text: We are glad to hear about your 5-star experience! Thank you for choosing Aspire 7th & Grant.

reviews.author: Antonio Ayala
reviews.text: Harvest has been amazing to live at for the last 2.5 years and having just recently renewed im looking forward to remaining. Like any luxury complex, there are always the highs and lows. I would have to say under the new management of Kairoi the apartment complex has undergone many great improvements. From an increase in community events, to maintaining communication with residents, and improved maintenance. Overall residents are friendly and welcoming easy to converse and get to know or simply say hello to.  Great community structure all around.
reviews.response_text: Thank you so much for your thoughtful review and for calling Harvest home for the past 2.5 years — and for choosing to renew with us! We truly appreciate your continued trust in our community. We’re especially glad to hear that you’ve noticed the positive changes under Kairoi’s management, from enhanced communication and community events to improved maintenance. Our team works hard to create not just a beautiful place to live, but a connected and welcoming environment where residents feel at home. It’s wonderful to hear that you’ve experienced the friendly, neighborly atmosphere that makes Harvest so special. That sense of community is something we’re very proud of and continuously strive to strengthen. Thank you again for sharing your experience. We’re grateful to have you as part of the Harvest community and look forward to many more great moments ahead!

reviews.author: Taylor Fan
reviews.text: I moved into Harvest last month and have had a wonderful experience. The office and maintenance staff are kind and helpful. I’ve never lived in an apartment complex that has a regular cleaning staff, but Harvest does. Hallway floors, windows, and communal spaces get regularly mopped, vacuumed, and dusted. It’s so nice to live in a building that is well-maintained and respected. All of the residents who live near me are friendly, quiet, and respectful. There are resident events so you can get to know your neighbors. The location is great too! I’m so glad I moved here.
reviews.response_text: Thank you so much for the amazing review and welcome to Harvest! We’re thrilled to hear that your first month has been such a positive experience. It means a lot to know that our office and maintenance teams have made you feel supported and at home. We take great pride in keeping our community clean and well cared for, so we truly appreciate you recognizing the work that goes into maintaining the hallways and shared spaces. Creating a comfortable, well-respected environment for our residents is always a top priority. We’re also so glad you’re enjoying the friendly atmosphere, resident events, and our convenient location. Building a strong sense of community is important to us, and it’s wonderful to hear that you’re already feeling that connection. Thank you again for choosing Harvest — we’re so happy you’re here and look forward to continuing to make your experience a great one!

reviews.author: S G
reviews.response_text: We noticed your 1-star review and would truly like the opportunity to understand your experience. However, since no comments were included and the review appears to be anonymous, we’re unable to verify the situation or reach out directly to learn more. We take all feedback seriously and are always open to constructive conversations about how we can improve. If you’re willing, we encourage you to contact our office directly so we can better understand your concerns and work toward a resolution. Our team is committed to providing a positive experience for our residents and guests, and we welcome the chance to connect with you. Please reach out to us.

reviews.author: Tommy
reviews.text: Absolute amazing team! From the tour with Duncan to working with Wyatt, everyone was great and the residence is gorgeous. 12/10. Don’t settle paying high prices for average apartment when you can move here
reviews.response_text: Hi Tommy! Thank you for the 5-star review and the 12/10 rating—we’ll take that all day. We’re thrilled to hear you had such a great experience from your tour with Duncan through working with Wyatt, and that the community made a strong impression. We agree—no reason to settle when you can have a gorgeous home and an amazing team. Welcome to Harvest, and thank you for the kind words!

reviews.author: Emilio Vinzon (Emilio)
reviews.text:
I’ve really enjoyed living at Harvest Apartments. The community is quiet, well maintained, and feels safe. The apartments are modern and comfortable, and the common areas are always clean.

The management team is responsive and professional, and maintenance requests are handled quickly, which makes a big difference. I also appreciate the location — it’s convenient and close to everything I need.

Overall, it’s been a great place to call home, and I would definitely recommend Harvest to anyone looking for a comfortable and well-managed apartment community.
reviews.response_text: Thank you for the 5-star review and for sharing your experience at Harvest. We’re glad to hear you’ve enjoyed the quiet, well-maintained atmosphere and that the community feels safe and comfortable. It’s great to know our team’s responsiveness and quick maintenance support have made a difference, and that the location has been convenient for you as well. We truly appreciate the recommendation and are grateful to have you as part of the Harvest community!

reviews.author: Jhennifer Mendes
reviews.text:
I’ve been living at Harvest for almost 2 years now, and I can honestly say it has been a wonderful experience. From day one, the community has felt welcoming, safe, and well cared for, and it
truly feels like home.

The staff is incredibly friendly and helpful, always willing to go the extra mile. I especially want to give a big thank you to Duncan — he’s amazing and always ready to help with anything you need, which really makes life here easier and more enjoyable.

The property is well maintained, the apartments are comfortable, and the overall atmosphere is calm and pleasant. I’ve enjoyed living here so much that I plan to renew my lease again next year without hesitation.

I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a great place to live with an awesome community and supportive staff.
reviews.response_text: Hi Jhennifer! Thank you so much for the thoughtful 5-star review and for calling Harvest home for nearly two years—we truly appreciate your loyalty. We’re thrilled to hear that the community feels welcoming, safe, and well cared for, and that it genuinely feels like home. That’s exactly the experience we strive to create. A special thank you for recognizing Duncan—he’ll be glad to know his support has made such a positive impact. We’re also happy to hear you’ve enjoyed the maintenance, comfort of your apartment, and the calm atmosphere throughout the community. We’re honored that you plan to renew again next year and are grateful to have you as part of the Harvest community. Thank you for the recommendation and for being such a valued resident.

reviews.author: Mandi Williams
reviews.text: I recently moved into this property. I love it! The apartment is very spacious, modern and I love the back splash in the kitchen. Ive really been enjoying the outdoor lounge areas as well. The property manager Whitley has been wonderful, so helpful, informative and quick to respond. It's nice having a property manager that actually cares and listens.
reviews.response_text:
Thank you so much for the five-star review! We’re thrilled to hear you’re loving your new home—from the spacious, modern layout to that kitchen backsplash (it is a favorite 😉).
We’re also glad you’re getting good use out of the outdoor lounge areas—those were designed to be enjoyed, not just admired. And thank you for the kind words about Whitley. Providing responsive, thoughtful support is always the goal, and it means a lot to know it’s being felt. Welcome home, and thank you for being part of our community!

reviews.author: Александр Манкевич
reviews.text:
We have been living at Harvest Apartments for over a year now, and my wife, our small child, and I truly enjoy living here. It’s a comfortable, peaceful, and family-friendly place to call home.

The location is very convenient and quiet, which is especially important for us as a family with a young child. The management team is excellent — always friendly, professional, and quick to help with any requests.

The community offers many great amenities, including a well-equipped gym, a jacuzzi, and cozy relaxation rooms. Everything is well maintained and thoughtfully designed for residents’ comfort.

We highly recommend Harvest Apartments to anyone looking for a calm and pleasant place to live.
reviews.response_text: Thank you so much for the five-star review and for being part of the Harvest community for over a year now. It means a lot to hear that you, your wife, and your little one feel comfortable and at home here—that’s exactly the kind of environment we strive to create. We’re glad the quiet, convenient location is working well for your family and that the team has been friendly, professional, and responsive when you’ve needed support. It’s also great to hear you’re enjoying the amenities—from the gym to the jacuzzi and relaxation spaces. We put a lot of care into keeping everything well maintained and resident-focused. Thank you for the recommendation and for choosing Harvest as your home. We truly appreciate having your family as part of our community.

reviews.author: Diana Germanov
reviews.text: Helpful and responsive staff, fun community events, and super clean common areas inside and out!
reviews.response_text: Thank you so much for the five-star review! We’re so happy to hear you’re enjoying the helpful, responsive team, our community events, and the cleanliness of the common areas—inside and out (our standards are high, on purpose). It was also so great seeing your artistic skills at last week’s Holiday Atelier: A Modern Garland Party. Your garland was absolutely adorable—clearly creativity is one of your talents. We love when residents bring that kind of energy to our events. Thanks for being such a wonderful part of our community. We’re already looking forward to the next event!

reviews.author: Chawn Diaz
reviews.text: I’ve lived at harvest since October of 2025 and have loved it. The old management was good and the new one is even better, so much so that I’ve decide to resign my lease and continue living here. The property team is fast, responsive, and reliable. Not to mention the lengths they go to to make harvest a fun and inviting place live by setting up community events like candle making classes, yoga sessions and my personal favorite, the FriYay sips. If you’re looking for a nice quiet, safe and friendly community, this is the place for you.
reviews.response_text: Thank you so much for the great review—and for choosing to renew your lease with us. That’s the highest compliment we can get. We’re really glad to hear you’ve had a positive experience both before and after the management transition and that the current team’s responsiveness and reliability have stood out. Creating a community that’s not just well-run, but genuinely enjoyable to live in, is a big priority for us. We love that you’re enjoying the events—candle making, yoga, and yes… FriYay Sips tends to be a crowd favorite for a reason. Thank you for recommending Harvest as a quiet, safe, and friendly place to live. We’re grateful to have you as part of the community and look forward to many more good times ahead.

reviews.author: Jim Russell
reviews.text:
Melissa and I just moved into Harvest Apartments and it’s been an awesome experience so far. From day one, the staff has been genuinely helpful and easy to work with—especially Duncan and Wyatt. They made the move-in process smooth, answered every question we had, and have continued to be super responsive any time we need anything.

The building itself feels clean, well cared for, and the design/decor is modern without trying too hard—really comfortable and welcoming. The amenities have been a huge bonus too. The common areas are great for relaxing (TV lounges, firepits, and plenty of seating), and having BBQ grills, a pool and hot tub, plus a solid fitness center makes it feel like you’re getting perks you’ll actually use—not just “nice on paper.”

We’ve also been impressed with maintenance. They’ve been quick to fix things and communication has been clear the whole time. It’s always easy to get ahold of the team, which is honestly rare these days.

Location-wise, it’s hard to beat—close to Temple Square and all the downtown Salt Lake attractions. And inside the apartment, it’s surprisingly quiet. We feel safe here and really happy with our choice. Highly recommend Harvest if you’re looking for a clean, modern place with great staff and amenities.
reviews.response_text:
Thank you so much for the five-star review and for sharing such thoughtful feedback. We’re thrilled to hear that your experience at Harvest Apartments has been a strong one right from day one.

It’s great to know Duncan and Wyatt helped make your move-in smooth and continue to be responsive and easy to work with—that level of service is exactly what we aim for. We’re also glad the community’s modern design, cleanliness, and amenities are living up to expectations (the kind you actually use, not just admire). Hearing that maintenance has been prompt and communicative, the apartments feel quiet and secure, and the location is working well for your lifestyle really seals the deal for us. We’re so happy you and Melissa feel at home here and confident in your choice. Welcome to Harvest, and thank you again for the recommendation—we’re glad to have you as part of the community.

reviews.author: Meghan Robinson
reviews.text: I moved into Harvest sight unseen almost 2 years ago and I couldn't be happier with my choice. The location is great because you are close enough to downtown, but also get the quiet of a neighborhood and easy access to 15! The leasing office and maintenance staff are very friendly and welcoming - it's been a great place to live!
reviews.response_text: Thank you so much for the five-star review and for being such a wonderful part of the Harvest community for nearly two years now. We truly appreciate your support—it means more to us than you know. We’re so glad the location has been the perfect balance of convenience and calm, and that our leasing and maintenance teams have helped make Harvest feel like home. And of course, we have to give a special shout-out to one of our community favorites—your fur baby, Bixby.  We absolutely love seeing you both and look forward to your daily stop-bys for Bixby’s afternoon sweet treat. Thank you again for choosing Harvest and for bringing such great energy (and paws) to our community.

reviews.author: Tiffany Moza
reviews.text: 🏠 I'm loving this apartment community and I think you might too! This Harvest community is a great place to live - it's quiet, friendly, and the leasing office is super helpful. I'd love to invite you to join our community! If you're interested in learning more, feel free to reach out to them or stop by the leasing office. They're always happy to chat and answer any questions you might have.
reviews.response_text: Hi Tiffany! Thank you so much for the 5-star review and the kind words! We’re thrilled to hear you’re enjoying the Harvest community and that our team has been helpful. Creating a quiet, welcoming place to call home is exactly what we aim for, and it means a lot to know that’s been your experience. We truly appreciate you being part of our community and for sharing the love with others!

reviews.author: Robin Nelson
reviews.text: I love living here! Everyone is so nice, the layout of my place is great, and the gym is awesome.
reviews.response_text: Hi Robin! Thank you for the 5-star review! We’re so glad to hear you’re loving your home, the layout, and the overall community. And yes—the gym really is a standout. We’re especially proud of it since adding the mirrors; they’ve completely elevated the space and made workouts even better. Thanks for being part of Harvest—we’re lucky to have you!

reviews.author: Colby Earl
reviews.text: We have lived here for over 16 months and we couldn’t be happier with it. The management responds in a very timely manner and they seem to actually care. The location is great and the community is even better. Not a bad once to live 😎
reviews.response_text: Thank you for the 5-star review and for calling Harvest home for over 16 months—that means a lot to us. We’re glad our team’s responsiveness and care have stood out, and we couldn’t agree more about the location and the community. We truly appreciate you being part of Harvest and are grateful you chose to stay with us!

reviews.author: navya tushara
reviews.text: Been here for 5 months. Love the location, maintenance and interactive activities at the apartment. Great experience living here!
reviews.response_text: Hi Navya! Thank you so much for the 5-star review! We remember your move-in day—it was a bit hectic, occurring on the day of management transition, so we really appreciate your patience and understanding. We’re thrilled to hear you’re enjoying the location, maintenance support, and our community activities. It’s great having you as part of Harvest!

reviews.author: B M
reviews.response_text: Thank you so much for the 5-star review! We’re thrilled to hear you’re enjoying your experience at Harvest Apartments. Our team works hard to make this a comfortable, welcoming community, and feedback like yours means the world to us. If you ever need anything, please don’t hesitate to reach out to the leasing office—we’re always here to help!

reviews.author: Logan Howard
reviews.text: They took care of me each step of the way moving in. Great attention to detail.
reviews.response_text: Thank you so much for the wonderful review! We’re thrilled to hear that our team was able to support you through every step of your move-in. Providing attentive, detailed service is something we’re truly proud of, and we’re glad it made your experience a great one. Welcome home to Harvest Apartments—please let us know if there’s anything you need as you get settled in!

reviews.author: Geraldine Ocaranza
reviews.text:
I just had my first night here, and I’m really disappointed by how noisy the apartment is. The master room’s window is so thin it feels like it’s open, street noise and drafts come right through. Around 6 a.m. a constant tapping started, which I believe are the pipes, and it hasn’t stopped (currently 0920). To top everything off the AC sounds like a vacuum.

Duncan was a great salesman and very helpful, so I’d give him 5 stars but the unit’s overall quality is far below what I expected. I’m not looking forward to spending a year in this maddeningly noisy room.

reviews.author: christine Bull
reviews.text:
I’m very pleased with Kairoi
Mgmt. the halls and mailroom are always clean and orderly. The staff especially Duncan are very helpful and always there for you.  They are attempting to do gathering once to twice a month to have us meet other tenants.  I love the peaceful atmosphere overlooking Marmalade Park also.
reviews.response_text: Thank you for your review. We're delighted you appreciate our clean facilities, helpful staff like Duncan, and peaceful Marmalade atmosphere!

reviews.author: Dallas Thatcher
reviews.text: The move in process was smooth and painless. Wyatt was as on top of things and made things happen quickly
reviews.response_text: Thank you for sharing your experience. We're glad Wyatt made your move-in smooth and handled everything quickly & we are excited to have you as a Resident at Harvest!

reviews.author: Jarred Ellerbroek
reviews.text: Amazing community, very peaceful and great customer service and hospitality from Duncan in the leasing office.
reviews.response_text: Hi Jared! Thank you for your 5-Star Review! We are o excited to have you as one of our newest resident! We hope to see you tonight at our Fri-YAY Sips Resident Event!

reviews.author: Sunanda Datla
reviews.text: staff were very helpful
reviews.response_text: We greatly appreciate your feedback about our helpful staff. Your experience means everything to us.

reviews.author: Eryn
reviews.response_text: We sincerely value your five-star rating and appreciate you choosing Harvest for your experience.

reviews.author: Emily
reviews.response_text: Your feedback is incredibly valuable. Thank you for sharing your experience with Harvest. If you have any further questions or feedback, please feel free to reach out to us at (888) 321-5172.

reviews.author: Weston Olsen
reviews.text: I’ve been living here a little over a year, and when Kairoi took over I was honestly a little nervous about what the future at Harvest would look like. But I can’t say enough about the team and how much effort they put into the property. Greystar did an okay job, but the difference now is clear. I can walk through clean hallways and community spaces without feeling like I have to tidy them up myself before using them. On top of that, the team has been amazing. They’re always welcoming, professional, and go out of their way to make sure residents feel taken care of.
reviews.response_text: Hi Weston! We can’t thank you enough for sharing this feedback. Transitioning management companies can feel uncertain, so it means a lot to hear that our efforts have made a positive difference in your experience at Harvest. Keeping the community clean, welcoming, and well cared for is something we take pride in, and knowing that it’s been noticed makes the work worthwhile. We’ll be sure to share your kind words with the team—they’ll be thrilled to know their professionalism and care are making an impact. We’re so glad you’re part of the community.

reviews.author: Jessy Scarantino
reviews.response_text: Hi Jessy! We weren’t able to find any record of you as a resident or a prospective resident here at Harvest Apartments, which makes it difficult to understand the reason behind your review. If there’s feedback you were hoping to share—whether related to construction or another experience—we’d truly appreciate the chance to hear more directly. Please reach out to our office so we can discuss.

reviews.author: Morgan Morgan
reviews.response_text: Hi John! Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience and leave us a 5-star review! We’re glad to know you’re enjoying the community, and we truly appreciate your support. Please don’t hesitate to reach out if there’s ever anything we can do to make your time at Harvest even better.

reviews.author: Gavin Massey
reviews.text:
Think twice before renting any property managed by Greystar

I rented an apartment here last year.  The place was okay.  But there are a few things you should be aware of before you rent.

1) The management company is facing several class action lawsuits for deceptive business practices, one in Colorado and one in California.  The cost to rent is not what they tell you upfront.  I noticed a discrepancy myself.  At first I thought it was just a miscommunication but I found out there is litigation against them in two different states for misleading renters about the cost.

"Class Action Lawsuit: In April 2025, a class action lawsuit was filed against Greystar in California federal court, alleging similar deceptive practices and violation of various state and federal consumer laws. This lawsuit specifically claims that Greystar charges illegal fees for services like pest control and trash that should be part of the rent."

2) Noise!  I had a very difficult time sleeping because the noise of traffic and motorcycles going by the building at night would keep me up.

So, in summary, expect the actual cost to rent to be greater than the quoted cost, and don't expect to sleep well if you are a light sleeper.
reviews.response_text: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We understand your concerns and want to provide some important clarification. As of May 28, 2025, Harvest Apartments is no longer managed by Greystar. Our community is now proudly managed by Kairoi Residential, a team fully focused on transparency, resident satisfaction, and providing an elevated living experience. We recognize that noise can be a challenge in an urban setting, and while some external factors are outside our control, our onsite team is committed to helping residents find solutions where possible to make their homes more comfortable. We invite you to connect with our office directly if you’d like to discuss your past concerns further. We’re excited about the future under new management and are confident residents will notice the positive difference.

reviews.author: Brooke Brown
reviews.text: I recently moved my daughter into harvest from North Dakota. We were drawn to this property to due to the close freeway access, the attached coffee shop and the library, which is perfect since she is studying at the U. The leasing team was great, especially Whitley who provided a video walk through tour of the floor plans and was super thorough about the community. I feel comfortable having my daughter live here away from home.
reviews.response_text: Thank you so much for the kind words and the 5-star review! We’re thrilled to hear that you and your daughter chose Harvest, and even more so that the location and community amenities are a great fit for her lifestyle. It was a pleasure helping you through the process—especially from a distance—and I’m so glad the video tour helped provide peace of mind. We’re honored to be her home away from home and look forward to supporting her during her time here!

reviews.author: Talia Gallegos
reviews.text: Just recently moved in and I couldn't be more happy. The staff is excellent. They gave me an amazing tour, taking time to show me every different floor plan within my range and answered every question I had with ease. I didn't feel rushed or uncomfortable, the team was super friendly and welcoming. I'm very excited to get settled and start making memories here!
reviews.response_text:
Hi Talia! Thank you so much for the glowing review and for choosing The Harvest as your new home!  We're thrilled to hear that your move-in experience was smooth and that our team made you feel welcomed and supported throughout the process. Taking the time to make sure you felt comfortable and informed is exactly what we strive for!
We’re so excited to have you as part of the community and can’t wait to see you start making memories here. If there's ever anything you need, don’t hesitate to reach out—we're always here for you!

reviews.author: Tamice Alvarado
reviews.text: My best friend lives here and the new management has really been sprucing up the place. It looks great ❤️ She's excited to see what they do next!
reviews.response_text: Hi Tamice! Thank you so much for the kind words! We're thrilled to hear your best friend is enjoying the changes — our team has been hard at work making improvements, and there’s more to come!  We’re just getting started and can’t wait to continue enhancing the community for all our residents (and their awesome friends too). Thanks for the love and support!

reviews.author: Brent A.
reviews.text: Recently moved into the Harvest Apartments and I have been beyond pleased with experience so far! The application process was simple and straightforward, and everyone in the management office has been incredibly communicative and helpful. I was greeted with a thoughtful welcome home git at move-in and my apartment smelled clean, fresh, and ready to go. Super excited to start this new chapter in Salt Lake and I feel great about calling Harvest home!
reviews.response_text: Hi Brent! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience! We're thrilled you're calling Harvest home in Salt Lake City!

reviews.author: William Migdal
reviews.text:
I had the pleasure of meeting Duncan, one of the leasing agents, at a recent welcoming event, and I have to say, his customer service was truly outstanding. Duncan was not only professional and knowledgeable.

The leasing manager, who I've met during recent tours. Was very welcoming. I recommend anyone looking for an apartment to live here.
reviews.response_text: Hi William! Thank you so much for your kind words! We’re thrilled to hear you had such a positive experience with Duncan — he truly brings great energy and care to every interaction. We’re also glad you had the opportunity to meet our Community Director, Whitley. With years of experience managing lease-ups and transitions throughout downtown Salt Lake City, Sugar House, and Sandy, she brings a strong foundation of leadership and service to Harvest. We’re excited to have a refreshed team and new management in place, and we’re committed to making Harvest a place residents are proud to call home. Thank you for your recommendation — we’re grateful to have you in the community!

reviews.author: Jack Palmer
reviews.text: I had a fantastic experience touring the property with Duncan. From the moment I arrived, he was welcoming, professional, and extremely knowledgeable. He took the time to understand what I was looking for and tailored the tour to highlight the features that mattered most to me. Duncan was patient, answered all of my questions thoroughly, and made the entire process feel smooth and stress-free. You can tell he genuinely cares about helping people find the right fit. Highly recommend working with him!
reviews.response_text: Hi Jack! Thank you so much for the kind words and thoughtful feedback! We're thrilled to hear that your tour with Duncan was such a positive experience. He truly has a gift for making people feel welcome and supported, and we’re lucky to have him on our team. We’re glad he was able to help tailor your visit to what mattered most to you — that’s exactly the experience we aim to provide. If there’s anything else we can assist with, don’t hesitate to reach out. We hope to welcome you to the community soon!

reviews.author: Milagros Bueno Martínez
reviews.text: Muy bello ese lugar

reviews.author: Trevor Cates
reviews.text: Poor management! They have changed the method to pay online and only offered an option to pay by check with very little notice. We're traveling and had the payments on autopay so thought we were good and then all of a sudden the portal to access everything is gone. I've tried calling and the numbers have changed. Left a message and haven't heard back. Honestly, I will want to do is pay rent on time but they've made it really hard.
reviews.response_text:
Hi Trevor! 
Thank you for your feedback, and we’re sorry to hear that the transition has caused frustration. We'd like to offer some clarity around the changes. The recent management transition at Harvest was part of a rapid industry-standard process, which unfortunately can lead to brief gaps in online systems. As the previous management’s portal was deactivated, and our new systems were not yet live, we required a one-time physical payment by check or money order to ensure rent could still be processed on time. We understand this was inconvenient — especially for residents who were traveling or had autopay set up. During this time, our office phone systems (marketing phone number) and resident portal were also updated, and we encouraged all communication via email to create a clear paper trail and ensure all resident inquiries were addressed in order of receipt. This process helped us manage a high volume of questions and ledger verifications efficiently and fairly. We absolutely understand that no one wants to jump through hoops to pay rent — and that’s never our goal. Now that our systems are fully live, we’re committed to making rent payment and communication as seamless as possible going forward. Thank you for your patience as we continue improving your experience at Harvest. If you're still having trouble accessing the portal or need assistance, please don’t hesitate to reach out to our team via email and we’ll be happy to help.

reviews.author: Heather Apo
reviews.text: So the management employees and manager announced another company taking over Harvest Apartments THE day of the takeover.  The new management property did post flyers with information on our doors and I did see them doing a sort of inspection - I hope they are better than Greystar.  We as tenants are in limbo waiting to see how we pay rent, call maintenance, security, etc..very unprofessional of the greystar management company.  The insulation in apartments is almost nonexistent- the heater makes the pipes make cracking noises all night,  the pool hours are not supervised at all, and security rarely comes if called.  The apartment is ok but Not worth the price.  They definitely appear to be nice during the tours but once you live in them the discrepancies become apparent- just a fyi-
reviews.response_text:
Hi Heather! 
Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts. We understand that transitions can be unsettling, especially when communication from prior management was limited. The concerns you mentioned — from maintenance and security to insulation and pool supervision — are important and valid, and we appreciate you bringing them to light.
While the transition timeline was abrupt, we want to assure you that the new management team is fully committed to making meaningful improvements across the board. You may have already seen some of our team on-site conducting property assessments — these are the first steps toward identifying areas where we can elevate the resident experience. We’re optimistic that with a refreshed team, responsive leadership, and a renewed focus on service, your experience at Harvest will improve. Our goal is to create a community where residents feel supported, heard, and proud to call home. Thank you again for your feedback — we hope to earn your trust and show you the difference our team can make.

reviews.author: A.J. Lombardi
reviews.text:
Unresponsive management, over priced, and inconsistent accommodations.

Without warning today they revoked our renters insurance and removed the online payment option making it so we all have to pay with checks in person
reviews.response_text:
Hi AJ,
Here at Harvest, we strongly believe that all feedback is an opportunity for improvement, and we thank you for being so transparent in sharing your concerns. We are currently undergoing system changes and apologize for any frustrations this may have caused you. We greatly appreciate your patience while we navigate through these adjustments. If you would like to speak about this directly, please feel free to email me at harvestmgr@greystar.com.

reviews.author: Kayla Dunzinger
reviews.text: Vanessa was BEYOND helpful when my friend was in a difficult situation and needed a place asap. Pulled all the stops and got her into an apartment very quickly! She was so kind and we can’t thank her enough for being so gracious and understanding throughout the whole process.
reviews.response_text: Thank you so much for your thoughtful review! We're incredibly proud to have Vanessa on our team—her dedication, compassion, and willingness to go the extra mile truly shine through in moments like these. We're so glad she was able to support your friend during a challenging time. I’ll be sure to share your kind words with her—they mean a great deal to all of us!

reviews.author: Chasity Gray
reviews.response_text: Hi Chasity Gray - thanks so much for the high star rating!

reviews.author: Jacob Protheroe
reviews.text:
*Update from 5 star to 2 star: This is the 3rd time our heat has gone out and I've woken up to a sub 60 degree apartment... all in the Winter months. These also tend to not be quick repairs despite falling under "emergency maintenance" in my eyes. I figured something as serious as heat not working would be more of a priority in winter. We've gone entire weekends without heat due to faulty repairs; for example, Heat went out Friday Jan 31st. Maintenance repairs heat same day, but it goes out after they leave, only to not be fully repaired until the following Monday, February 3rd. To make matters worse, any heaters we plug in to alleviate the issue tend to cause our circuit breaker to trip (which is an electrical fire hazard alone). I have been patient with this issue, but it is unacceptable to have not repaired this by now. Considering how much we pay in rent, a prorated month would be appreciated for the substantially lowered quality of life.

Daniel and Mark were absolutely fantastic in helping with our leasing questions and for move in - thus far, the management team have been incredibly welcoming, knowledgeable, and easy to work with. We've lived at two Greystar properties now, and both were managed very well.

The units are modern, spacious, and have good appliances. I do wish there was better sound insulation for the price we pay, but noise is to be expected on a main road - we've found that having some form of background noise effectively blocks most vehicle noise. The property seems to have great amenities, but we haven't had the chance to take advantage of them yet. However, we have explored the area quite a bit, and this location is awesome! Walking distance to so much - you certainly won't be bored!
reviews.response_text: Jacob Protheroe - you're our first priority! We're happy our team members went Beyond Expectations for you here at Harvest Apartments. Thank you so much - hope you have a fantastic day!

reviews.author: Charles Rodriguez
reviews.response_text: Hi Charles Rodriguez - thanks so much for the star rating! If you have any further questions, please don't hesitate to reach out!

reviews.author: Alfredo Wiesner
reviews.text:
Living here has been a disappointing experience overall, despite a few good points. The building itself looks nice, but the luxury amenities are overpriced for what they offer. Our apartment isn’t well-insulated, so we constantly hear loud vehicle noises from outside, making it difficult to sleep at night.

Interactions with management have been particularly frustrating, especially with Laura, the head manager. She’s been rude and dismissive whenever I’ve tried to discuss issues, such as an unexpected $250 fine due to problems with their auto-bill system. I tried to work something out regarding this fee, but she was completely uncooperative and, frankly, unpleasant about it. In one instance, she even made disrespectful remarks in Spanish, assuming I wouldn’t understand—I’m from South America. This happened when I repeatedly asked her to fix a broken storage door so I could access my storage unit, but despite my efforts, the issue was never resolved.

The rent policies are also quite harsh, with hefty fines if payment isn’t made within three days. To make matters worse, my car was towed over a miscommunication, despite my plates being up-to-date, because the towing company didn’t properly check my information.

The only positives have been the maintenance team, especially Brian and Nestor, who have consistently been helpful, and Maddie in management, who has a friendly and upbeat attitude. However, these few bright spots don’t make up for the negative experiences. I’ll be moving out as soon as possible and would only recommend this complex if significant improvements are made.
reviews.response_text:
Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We're genuinely sorry to hear that your experience here hasn't been as positive as we would hope for our residents. We take all concerns seriously and are committed to making continuous improvements.

Regarding your experience with the insulation and noise issues, we understand how disruptive this can be and will review ways to address noise management within the building. Additionally, we are always looking for ways to enhance our amenities to ensure they meet the expectations of our residents.

We also apologize for any frustration caused during your interactions with management. It's never our intention to make our residents feel dismissed or disrespected. I’m truly sorry that you felt this way, and we’ll be addressing your concerns internally to ensure better communication going forward.

We’re glad to hear that our maintenance team and Maddie were able to provide you with the support you needed, and we appreciate you recognizing their efforts. We wish you all the best in your future endeavors and hope that you find a living situation that better suits your needs. Thank you again for your feedback.

Sincerely,
Laura

reviews.author: Aparna Mangadu
reviews.text: I moved to harvest apartments in July and have had a wonderful experience so far! The units are very modern and have quite a bit of space. I also really enjoy the amenities like the gym, courtyards, and terraces. The management team is always super helpful and any maintenance requests are usually resolved within a day! I also really like that the leasing office will host socials very often so it’s easy to make friends! The other day we had a pumpkin painting social and it was so much fun (drinks and food provided!). Totally recommend living here and the location is great, close to downtown and many shops.
reviews.response_text: Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We're thrilled to hear that you're enjoying your experience at Harvest Apartments. It’s great to know you love the modern units, amenities, and the social events we host. We strive to create a welcoming community, and it’s fantastic that you had fun at the pumpkin painting social! If you ever need anything or have suggestions, don’t hesitate to reach out. We appreciate your recommendation and look forward to continuing to make your home a great place to live!

reviews.author: Jesus Christ
reviews.text: The management is rude, unprofessional, and lacks compassion or empathy for residents. I would not recommend moving here.
reviews.response_text:
Thank you for your feedback. We strive to maintain a supportive and professional environment, and I’m sorry to hear that you feel we have not met those standards. However, we believe it’s important to clarify that our team has been nothing but professional in every conversation, working diligently to assist you and answering all your questions.

We’re perplexed by your comments and don’t understand why you feel this way, especially given our commitment to supporting our residents. Despite our differences, we truly wish you all the best in your future endeavors.

reviews.author: Isaac Foutz
reviews.text: The move in process was quick and easy, and the management was very helpful. The views and amenities are the best in Salt Lake City for the value.
reviews.response_text: Awww, thanks Isaac Foutz! We really appreciate your kind words about Harvest Apartments! Let us know if you ever need any more help! All the best to you.

reviews.author: Tara Abruzzese
reviews.text:
I had hoped to enjoy living here, but unfortunately, my experience didn’t meet my expectations. The location is convenient, with easy access to the freeway and nearby coffee shops. However, while the property is marketed as ‘luxury,’ it feels more like a nice, standard apartment complex. The amenities are basic, and the ‘luxury’ label seems to come from the fact that the complex is new, rather than offering any truly upscale features.

My biggest issue was with the management. I found the property manager to be unprofessional during a disagreement about my lease, and she even hung up on me during a phone call. When I moved out, I was shocked by the unreasonable charges listed on the move-out checklist. Despite being told I would receive my remaining deposit within 14 days, it’s now been over a month, and I just received an email with instructions on how to get my deposit back.

On a positive note, the maintenance team was great, and Maddie was always pleasant to work with. However, those positives don’t outweigh the negative aspects of my time at Harvest.
reviews.response_text:
Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We’re glad to hear that you appreciated the convenient location and had a positive experience with our maintenance team and Madi. We strive to create a welcoming environment and are sorry to learn that your overall experience didn’t meet your expectations.

We take all feedback seriously and are continually working to improve our services and amenities. Your insights will help us enhance the living experience for all residents. If you have any further concerns or suggestions, please don’t hesitate to reach out directly. Thank you again for your comments, and we wish you all the best in your future endeavors!

reviews.author: Bri Thomas
reviews.text: The application process was super fast and smooth from start to finish. The staff was incredibly helpful, answering all my questions and keeping me updated every step of the way. Overall, it was such an easy and stress-free experience.

reviews.author: To Valid
reviews.text: Great people

reviews.author: Jayden Newsome
reviews.text: Easy and fast application process

reviews.author: Trinity Pope
reviews.text: Soon to be resident very excited hope all goes well

reviews.author: Jessica Cherry
reviews.text: I took a tour of the apartment and it looked very nice and spacious inside

reviews.author: Lvstē “Mimi” Hvrēssē
reviews.text: I have never been so excited about moving into a place! The application process was seamless and fast! I got an apartment that we can afford and the introductory deals are amazing! Definitely check them out for second chance apartments or looking for a new lease on life! (No pun intended!) Ask for KEYARA

reviews.author: Devon
reviews.text: Very easy and smooth application process , the ladies in office were nice, I love the 3 bedroom I am renting

reviews.author: Kayla
reviews.text:
LMAOOOO guys…the move in process is “so smooth and easy” because they want you locked into a lease before you figure out how dysfunctional and problem-ridden that whole place really is. Give all these bribed tenants leaving 5 stars a few months dealing with this place and watch their reviews disappear or turn sour.

Edit: if you need any more convincing this complex doesn’t care about its tenants….they moved an elderly man into this unit when I moved out. Yes this exact one here in the photos. I can almost guarantee you, they fixed nothing. So…they put an elderly man in a home THEY KNOW won’t quit flooding, has no AC, and has pest problems. Keep the elderly away from here unless you want this to be their potential final home. This place is hazardous….i worry about that man a lot in the upcoming summer knowing there was one point my unit got up to almost 90 inside. But hey, at least he has a window unit thanks to all the fighting I did with the office, right? Keeps it down to 80 degrees in there 🤨

For just $1095 a month (only $13,140 a year!), you can rent one of these beautiful units with these cool new water features they’re offering as of Christmas Eve!!! 9 entire days of all the water I could ask for flooding the lobby and seeping up through my floors! At least one of these lucky ground floor units is listed for this exact building as available and ready to move into right now!!!! It seems the staff is set on keeping partially aquatic buildings for the unforseeable future!!! Perfect for amphibious beings!!! And the water is likely running off the mice and roaches! Two birds, one stone! The water in THIS building keeps out the squatters, so it’s winning all around. Plus the office is very hands off and won’t intrude on your business even when you call the repeatedly! Definitely not a nosy landlord situation!

And if you DON’T like the water features then by summer it likely won’t be an issue since most units come WITHOUT one of those pesky working AC units. Everything will may be dry by then at this rate!

Ope sorry! Just realized rent prices went up from when I signed my lease! Dont forget to plan for the $70 water charge and required renters insurance when you calculate your rent cost!

EDIT: turns out the hack to getting a reply is by leaving a review! They replied to my review, but none of the messages or requests I sent! Stellar service!
reviews.response_text:
Update to edit: 4/12

Hi Kayla! 
We truly regret that your experience at The Izzy has left you feeling this way. We want to acknowledge the frustration and disappointment expressed in your message(s), and we’re sincerely sorry that we fell short of your expectations.

Your feedback, while difficult to read, is being taken seriously. We are especially concerned about the issues raised regarding flooding, pest control, air conditioning, and the well-being of all residents—including our elderly tenants. We’re actively reviewing the circumstances surrounding your former unit to ensure it meets our habitability standards for any future resident.

While we understand your frustration, we would still appreciate the opportunity to speak with you directly. If you’re open to a conversation, please contact us at info.izzy@cscapartments.com so we can better understand what happened and work toward meaningful resolution.

Thank you again for sharing your experience—it helps us recognize where we need to improve. Wishing you the best! 

Sincerely, 

The Izzy Team

reviews.author: Mimi Martin
reviews.text: I Moved Here In November Of 2023. The Property Manager &Staff Before Were More Respectful, Courteous &Understanding Than The Ones They Have There Now. (R.I.P. Shon) Since I Moved In, They Hadn't Kept Up With The Maintenance Requests &Now Theyre Trying To Charge Me For Stuff That Was In A Maintenance Log When I Moved In - It Was Just All Cleared So They Could Cover Themselves &Make It Seem Like They Were Doing Their Job When They Simply Weren't; i.e. Marking Requests As "Done", Even When They Weren't. I Have Been Here Without A.C. For 1 Year &11Months.  No One Checked On It Because They Claim The Maintenance Request Wasnt Documented. They Change Staff More Than People Renting Here. The Mice Are JUST ENOUGH To Make You Want To Break Your Lease Or Even Skip Out On The Rent. The Roaches, They Dont Really Care For - All They Do Is Schedule Pest Control Companies To Come Out &Spray &That's It. They Dont Care To Caulk The Cracks Where The Roaches Are Coming Out Of. I Moved Out In October Of 2025. I Would Post Pictures, But I Believe This Statement Will Say It All: If You Have A Voucher Or On H.U.D., DO NOT MOVE HERE! They Kicked Everybody Out Who Had A Balance (Even As Low As $400) Simply Because OHFA Is Not Gonna Play That Game Of Non-Habitable Situations. They Have Low Occupancy &Everyone Still There Are Simply Waiting Til Their Leases Are Up To Simply Leave &Write Reviews Afterwards. Dont Let Their Kindness Fool You - Everybody Thinks Chimpanzees Are Cute Until You Find Out What They Can Do To You. (Just Saying). The People In The Office Claim They Dont Have Corporates Number, When They Do. Just Go Watch NEWS CHANNEL 4 KFOR On Google. You're Welcome.

reviews.text:
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

I’ve lived at The Izzy Apartments for many years, and I have to say the new management team is a breath of fresh air! Shout out to the new crew for really knowing what they’re doing and getting the job done right the first time.

Big thanks to the new maintenance supervisor who finally fixed my heat and A/C  something that had been out for so long and never got taken care of by the previous team. It’s great to finally see people who care and take action.

If this team keeps up the great work, I truly believe The Izzy Apartments can become the great community it once was. Thanks again to Keyona and Daniel for making it happen!

reviews.author: Hannah Todd
reviews.text: I have loved living at the Heights! The area feels safe, the views are gorgeous, and the new management communicates more. I love having the covered parking, and the amenities are lovely and well kept. I use the fitness center most often and appreciate the diversity in equipment, though it could stand to lose the egregiously heavy free weights(literally no one uses those) and add multiple lighter weights(5s - 20s). The down sides are the ever so occurring fire alarm that goes off at night, and the inescapable valet trash monthly charge. Overall I believe the positives of this apartment complex outweigh the few issues… though that fire alarm has slowly been challenging my positive opinion. Regardless, I’d absolutely recommend living here!
reviews.response_text: We are absolutely thrilled to hear you love living at Heights! We understand your fire alarm concerns and appreciate your fitness center feedback.

reviews.author: Jack Leist
reviews.text: We've been here for a bit over 2 years, and overall we've been quite happy with everything. The location is fantastic (with the mountain views and pond), and the amenities and management are great too. The only significant downside, as I'm sure many residents are quick to mention, is the fire alarm problem. Every couple months, especially in the winter (and usually in the dead of night), the building-wide fire alarm goes off and forces everyone to wait outside in the cold. It's always a false alarm, and it seems like a problem that's been happening for years and seems will never be fixed. It sucks. But don't want to overstate the downside - all in all, we've been been very happy and have no plans to move anytime soon.
reviews.response_text:
Thank you so much for your thoughtful review and for calling Heights home for over two years.

We’re glad you’ve enjoyed the location, mountain views, and amenities. We genuinely appreciate hearing that you’ve been happy overall and plan to stay.

We also completely understand your frustration regarding the fire alarm activations, especially when they occur at night or during colder months. Regarding the fire alarm activation on January 12, the system detected a change in water pressure within the building’s fire suppression system and activated as a safety precaution. The system responded exactly as designed. Our team promptly investigated, confirmed there was no fire or danger, and verified that all systems were functioning properly. At no point were residents at risk. Management is actively working with our service providers to address the underlying cause and reduce the likelihood of future false activations. Resident safety remains our top priority, and we appreciate everyone’s patience as we continue to ensure the reliability of our life-safety systems.

Thank you again for your balanced and honest feedback. Our door is always open if you ever wish to connect with us at 303-522-5943 or heightsinterlocken@kairoi.com.

reviews.author: Rachel Getzinger
reviews.text: The fire alarm goes off every once in a while and when they charge you, it’s more than the bill. Otherwise great location and love the amentities
reviews.response_text:
Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We truly appreciate you highlighting our location and amenities, we’re so glad you’re enjoying those aspects of the community.

We understand how frustrating unexpected fire alarm activations can be. The system is designed to activate anytime it detects changes within the fire suppression system, as a safety precaution. While this can sometimes result in false alarms, it is functioning as intended to ensure resident safety. Our team investigates each occurrence immediately, confirms there is no danger, and works closely with our service providers to identify and correct the underlying cause. Resident safety remains our top priority, and we are actively working to minimize future disruptions.

Regarding billing concerns, we would very much like the opportunity to review this with you directly. Our goal is always to ensure charges are accurate and clearly communicated. Please reach out to us at 303-522-5943 or heightsinterlocken@kairoi.com so we can look into your account and address any discrepancies.

We appreciate your feedback and remain committed to delivering the level of experience our residents expect.

reviews.author: Rachel Barnes
reviews.text: I’m in my 2nd year at Heights and have experienced 3 management companies. The Kairoi team has made quick and impactful improvements since taking over. The office staff is incredibly friendly and helpful, maintenance requests are handled promptly, and they host a wide range of cool resident events on-site. Additionally, Heights offers apartments (and a pool) with mountain views, a beautifully maintained property, and a peaceful community surrounded by walking paths. It’s a wonderful place to call home.
reviews.response_text: Your positive feedback means everything. We're thrilled the Kairoi team's improvements and mountain views make Heights feel like home.

reviews.author: Bob Byrnes
reviews.text:
As retired homeowners, apartment living is a new experience for my wife and me. We selected Heights at Interlocken because it checked all the items on our must have list - elevators, garage parking and roof-top lounge. However, the biggest selling point was the views. Our apartment has unobstructed Mountain View’s from every window in the living area and two bedrooms.

The new complex management team has been great. They are always friendly and approachable, and are very responsive to requests and inquiries. The building, garage and public spaces are always well maintained. Their efforts to create a sense of community through various events is most appreciated.
reviews.response_text: We are delighted to hear you love the mountain views and appreciate our management team's community efforts!

reviews.text: I moved in during the summer 2025 and the new management team has been great since taking over at the end of 2025. I was skeptical at first but the team is very personable and helpful when I have questions or need anything. The complex is in a beautiful and quiet location. A great choice for anyone searching for an apartment.
reviews.response_text: We are glad to hear you're happy with our new management team and beautiful location. Thank you for choosing Heights at Interlocken!

reviews.text: I relocated to Colorado from Wisconsin and I couldn’t be happier that I landed at the Heights. My apartment is bright and open, the views are incredible, and the new management team has been nothing short of fantastic.
