reviews.author: Chase Maples
reviews.text:
Update: We have since moved out, but the Quinci was by far the worst "luxury living" community I've ever been in. Homeless, package theft, illegal parking at all times of day, off leash animals, fake reviews from employees of Kairoi, and a horrible location. Right now it seems the rent is effectively ~1700 a month, which is what I'd say it's worth. Rather than the 2450 they gave us for our lease renewal.

Where to even begin...To preface this review, Mikayla, Angel, and Josue are all great to work with. Moving in was easy. My partner and I have been at The Quinci for 4 months now and it has been by far the worst renting experience of our lives.

Upon move in, we were given information from previous property director Brittani about the timelines and capabilities of the amenities. These timelines were completely unfounded, as nothing besides the pickleball courts are currently available and we are a good portion through our lease already. Had we of known this, we would have chosen to live elsewhere. We are currently living in a CONSTANT construction zone, which shakes the buildings nearly everyday from 7am-4pm.

Within the past 4 months we have encountered the following issues (from least to most recent):
1. Some extremely inconsiderate tenants that trash the property with their cigarette butts and garbage
2. Off leash dogs roaming the property, sometimes with no owners in sight whatsoever
3. German cockroaches, which, hopefully, is now completely remedied.
4. Mailboxes weren't available to use for over 2 months of our lease. requiring us to drive to the airport post office to collect our mail, or wait for Mikayla to graciously collect it for us once a week.
5. Ant infestation. Now remedied.
6. Water heater wasn't turned on upon moving in, leaving us without hot water.
7. Bedroom door couldn't latch when closing
8. Charging station for electric vehicles still in development with no timelines or estimates in sight
9. Pickleball court lights only recently installed, over 3 months into our lease term
10. The grills are still not functional even though they're "Installed"
11. Rent has now decreased on this property over $200 a month and $300 a month for the 3 bedrooms.

Lastly, and the MOST important issue of all (as of late) is the complete repaving and re-construction of all of the driveways and entrances to our garages throughout the property due to it not being up to code for drainage. This is likely to leave us without access to our garages for well over a month, initially starting in early/mid October and supposedly ending mid November (originally expected end of October) with no consolation to the tenants from upper management. This has caused us to need to haul our groceries, gear, equipment, etc. 600 feet through construction each day. it's an enormous inconvenience to us as tenants, that the property owners couldn't care less about.

Mikayla has been a great help in hearing our complaints and helping us through so many of the issues we've had here. Unfortunately, enough is enough, and The Quinci is deserving of nothing more than the rating given. I highly encourage anyone reading this review and considering The Quinci to reconsider and move somewhere else more stable.
reviews.response_text: We are disappointed to hear about your experience at theQUINCI. Your feedback is valuable to us. Thank you for sharing your concerns.

reviews.text:
We did enjoy living here for a year.  But be warned, when you move out you will be charged a "standard cleaning fee" which is automatically taken from your deposit, regardless of what condition the apartment is left in (ours was spotless).  I've rented many other places and have never had this happen before.

In addition, I've been moved out for several months and still have not gotten my deposit back despite multiple emails and calls back and forth.  Disappointed with the unprofessionalism...

reviews.author: Brittany Tomasso
reviews.text:
I've been living at The Quinci for about six months now, and I would absolutely recommend it to anyone looking for a great place to live. The staff here are exceptional—Mikayla is always prompt and on top of any requests, and Brian is by far the kindest and most helpful leasing agent I’ve ever worked with. The maintenance team is also incredibly responsive and efficient, always quick to handle any repairs or issues that come up.

The only drawbacks I’ve experienced are due to a few residents: some people walk their dogs off-leash, which can be frustrating, and there are occasional problems with people parking in front of our garage, sometimes blocking us in or out for hours or even overnight. Fortunately, the staff does their best to handle these issues as quickly and effectively as possible.

Overall, my experience at The Quinci has been very positive, and the attentive and friendly team truly makes a difference.

There was some revisions that we needed and questions that we had throughout the process, and Angel was able to answer our questions and provide us with the information that we need. We have still yet to move in, but I figured I’d give my review to show how awesome the team over at TheQUINCI has been. Super excited to move in come mid-May!
reviews.response_text: Thank you for the kind words and positive feedback! We are privileged to have been part of your moving process from Texas to Utah. It has been such a pleasure working with both you and Jasmin throughout this transition, and we couldn't be more thrilled to have you join theQUINCI community. We look forward to welcoming you to your new home in mid-May and hope you'll continue to find our community as awesome as your initial experience has been.

reviews.author: Roxana Herrera
reviews.text: The unit is clean, modern, and well-maintained, with lots of natural light and great amenities. Maintenance is always quick to respond, I especially always have a great interaction with Mr. Dayton who quickly takes the time to help resolve any issue, and the management team is friendly and professional. Overall, it's been a fantastic place to call home, highly recommend!
reviews.response_text: Thank you for sharing your experience, Roxana! We are delighted to hear that you find our units clean, modern, and well-maintained with great amenities. We appreciate your positive feedback.

reviews.author: AB Brown
reviews.text: We love this place. Everyone on staff here is really nice and Dayton in maintenance gets everything done quickly and efficiently. Super friendly, super helpful! Great experience so far.
reviews.response_text: Thank you immensely for your kind words! We're so glad to have you as residents and part of theQUINCI community!

reviews.author: Fahina Tavake-Pasi
reviews.response_text: We are thrilled to hear about your positive experience with theQUINCI. Thank you for your feedback!

reviews.author: Kadeisha Kaauamo
reviews.text: Just moved here Last year summer feels A lot Homie its a lot of spacey for my Family who live here and who comes to visit! The Walls isn't that thin like the beverly lol where you can hear everyone's convos so moving here was great move and The Leasing agent Makayla is very helpful and  so kind and the maintenance gets things fixed when needed. So far Living here is Awesome!! i would def recommend this townhome to my family and friends !!! Also shouty to one of the best maintenance that I know Dayton Kaauamo Always making sure our residence is Happy and making sure they get what they need. He's very committed and won't leave most times til the residence is satisfied. He's one of kind.
reviews.response_text: We're thrilled to hear that you're enjoying your new home at theQUINCI! It's wonderful to know that you find the space comfortable for your family and visitors. We're glad that the walls provide better sound insulation compared to your previous residence. Thank you for your kind words about our office and maintenance team. We're proud of their dedication to ensuring our residents are happy and well taken care of. We truly appreciate your recommendation to family and friends and hope you continue to have a great experience living here.

reviews.author: Rodney Barona
reviews.response_text: We genuinely admire your positive feedback! Thank you for sharing your experience with theQUINCI.

reviews.author: Tanner Stott
reviews.text: Had a great tour with Angel! The home was very bright and spacious. He was very knowledgeable about pricing and the property. Highly recommend working with Angel and theQUINCI
reviews.response_text:
Hi Tanner,

Thank you for your kind words about your tour with Angel at theQUINCI. We're delighted you found the home bright and spacious, and that Angel was informative about pricing and the property. We appreciate your recommendation and feedback!

reviews.author: Parker Bryner
reviews.text: I toured their 3 bedroom townhome and loved the layout. The onsite team was incredibly friendly and helpful. Highly recommend.
reviews.response_text: Thank you so much for the kind words! We're so glad you loved the layout of the townhome and had a great experience with our team. We really appreciate your recommendation and hope to see you again soon!

reviews.author: Xuming Wang
reviews.text: I had an excellent experience with their leasing office. Lashawn and Mikayla were incredibly warm, friendly, and efficient. They helped me complete everything I needed for my move-in in just one day. Their customer service was exceptional, and I truly appreciated their kindness and professionalism. Highly recommend!
reviews.response_text: We're ecstatic to hear about your excellent experience with our leasing office. Thank you immensely for your kind words and recommendation!

reviews.author: Jennalee Larsen
reviews.text: Angel is amazing to work with and really cares about our future. Thank you for our new home!!
reviews.response_text: Hi Jennalee, thank you for your review! We're delighted to hear about your positive experience with Angel and happy you chose theQUINCI to be your new home.

reviews.author: Tristan Peninger
reviews.text: We’ve had the pleasure of working with Mikayla and Lashawn during the leasing process who’ve been wonderful. The apartment was pristine with no issues upon move in. We look forward to living here.
reviews.response_text: Hi Tristan, thank you for sharing your experience with Mikayla and Lashawn. We look forward to having you as a resident at theQUINCI and be a part of our community!

reviews.author: Michael Bangerter
reviews.text: We just moved in, and Lashawn and Mikayla were great about getting us moved in quickly without any issue. Our townhome was also received clean and in great quality.
reviews.response_text: Hi Michael, we're so glad your move-in went smoothly. We appreciate the positive feedback on your move-in experience with Lashawn and Mikayla. Thank you for sharing your experience with us!

reviews.author: Armin Kurudzija
reviews.text: Angel is the one who helped us, honestly I love everyone who works here! The staff is just so wonderful! Made us feel so welcomed and shared wonderful laughs! Move in process was so easy and love it here already!
reviews.response_text: Hi Armin, thank you so much for the positive review. We're glad Angel was able to help you and we could not be happier to have you join the community and call theQUINCI home!

reviews.author: Mackenzie Guzman
reviews.text: From touring to moving in Lashawn and Mikayla have been nothing short of helpful! Our short notice move in went incredibly smooth and all the leasing information was organized. Going on our second week at theQUINCI and we couldn’t be happier!
reviews.response_text: Hi Mackenzie, thank you for the positive review! We are so happy to hear about your experience and excited to have you call theQUINCI home! Let us know if you need anything, we're here to help.

reviews.author: Preston Hilburn
reviews.text:
theQUINCI has been a fantastic community for my family and I. We moved out of downtown looking for more space and better living. We have definitely found that here. The townhomes are beautiful and well designed. Having been here for part of summer, and winter; I can say they are well insulated and energy efficient too.

But the icing (and cherry too) on the cake would be the staff. Mikayla is amazing at her job. She is incredibly attentive to resident needs and handles everything with upmost professionalism. But it’s not just her, the whole staff is great! Maintenance is quick and responsive and does a great job.

If you’re looking for a new place. I HIGHLY recommend theQUINCI and their incredibly talented staff.
reviews.response_text:
Hi Preston,

Your review truly warmed our hearts here at theQUINCI! We’re so grateful for your kind words and are thrilled to have you as part of our community. It’s residents like you who make this place so special, and we’re honored to be a part of your experience.

If there’s anything you ever need, please don’t hesitate to reach out to me or any member of our team. We’re here for you!

Thank you,
Mikayla

reviews.author: Yorman Vega
reviews.response_text:
Hi Yorman, we appreciate the positive 5 star! We are excited to have you join the community and call theQUINCI home. Please reach out to us if you need anything. 

Thank you,
Mikayla

reviews.author: Sunday Hodge
reviews.text: My family and I love this place! Although the roads are not the best thing to deal with right now we have appreciated Mikayla and her team trying their best to make it easy going for us all. The townhomes are very spacious and absolutely love the kitchen space. We can finally entertain with friends and family! If you want a beautiful place to live I definitely recommend this place.
reviews.response_text:
Hi Sunday, 

Thank you so much for your lovely note! I’m so glad to hear you and your family are loving your new home. It’s wonderful that the kitchen is perfect for entertaining—there’s nothing like gathering with friends and family!

If you ever need anything please don't hesitate to reach out, theQUINCI team is always here. Here’s to making many happy memories in your beautiful townhome!

Thank you,
Mikayla

reviews.author: Deszy Collucci
reviews.text:
After reading the reviews, my wife and I were hesitant to move here. We made the decision to move-in after working with Mikayla. Our move-in process came with a few hiccups, however, Mikayla made it right every time.

We were made aware of the road closures due to asphalt repair a few days before our move-in. We were accommodated by being moved to a unit that could be accessed. In our lease, there was a form stating that construction may cause impacts to the property. Because of this, we had a clear understanding when the road closures occurred. Thankfully, we have not had any issues while parking in the parking lot behind the property. Mikayla has also provided us with reasonable compensation for the inconvenience.

Our garage and shower door have an ongoing maintenance issue that has yet to be resolved, however, the maintenance team was quick to come and identify the issue. Aside from that, our townhome seems to be nicely built and functional.

Overall, we have enjoyed our new home so far. Our neighbors have been welcoming and kind. We look forward to enjoying the amenities once they are ready!
reviews.response_text:
Hi Deszy,

Thank you so much for your heartfelt feedback! We are truly grateful for your kind words and for choosing to make our community your new home. It means a lot to me that I could assist you during the move-in process and welcome you to theQUINCI, and I appreciate your understanding regarding the road closures and ongoing maintenance issues.

I’m thrilled to hear that you’re enjoying your new townhome and that your neighbors have welcomed you warmly. It’s wonderful to know that you’re looking forward to enjoying our amenities once they’re ready—they’ll be worth the wait!

If you ever need anything or have further feedback, please don’t hesitate to reach out. I’m here to help make your experience as enjoyable as possible.

Warm regards,
Mikayla

reviews.author: Katherine Maestas
reviews.text: Really thankful for Mikayla and her team and how they are handling all the construction issues here at the townhomes. She is super quick to respond to questions, she is great at giving everyone updates and is always friendly when I go into the office. I know it's frustrating for everyone, but it's not a forever thing and everyone in the office is doing everything they can to take care of us.
reviews.response_text:
Hi Katherine! Thank you for the review and all your support for theQUINCI team. We greatly appreciate the kind words, along with your patience and understanding during this time. 

Thank you,
Mikayla

reviews.author: Alaina Schmidt
reviews.text:
- current resident of 4.5 months
- improper timeline expectations for amenities (couldn’t access mailbox for first two months, grills still not hooked up, still no EV station, no children’s play area)
- extreme construction project due to a builder’s oversight (rushed to slap it together without foresight on drainage codes, no access to garages for over a month due to this). On the fourth month of living here they decided to entirely rip up and repave the areas in front of the garages
- loud machinery, quaking apartment, litter and butts strewn about. Random beams and poles scattered, large equipment and no parking available on the property. Dirty and dusty
- park in a parking lot of an empty building where homeless hang out and there are no security cameras. Walk 600+ feet to your car
- no walkable destinations nearby and located in a trucking industrial part of town (priced the same as a sugarhouse or downtown apt with a pool and more amenities)
- lowered the price $200 for the same unit as a new resident because they are having trouble filling it up - yet I am expected to pay the higher rate for enduring this massive headache and quite honestly the worst apartment experience I’ve had in 27 years.

Don’t move here!!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.response_text: Hi Alaina,  thank you for your review.  We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience this may have caused and have worked around the clock with construction to get everything completed and have remained transparent through the process and providing updates as quickly as they are received. We are sorry that our avenues to remedy any situation through this have not been to your satisfaction.  We have reached out directly to you in hopes to find a solution moving forward.

reviews.author: Kona K
reviews.text:
I moved in a few months ago I lived around the area for years i love this location because I take my kids to school and I go work right in town it’s just fast access to the I-15 and the 201 and I-215. The place across the street is a Tongan restaurant it’s my favorite place to get food I love big plates.

The office is always responsive and always tending our needs and they are super nice thank you office team keep up the good work

The maintenance team great job on getting all of our task done not only me but everyone else here. It feels good when everything is maintain and running smoothly. We are lucky to have you guys. Stay positive and enjoy life stay blessed.
reviews.response_text: We're honored to have you as a resident at theQUINCI! Thank you for your kind words and positive feedback. Stay blessed!

reviews.author: Andrew Vagaia
reviews.text: Mikayla and Angel helped the process run smooth and were very transparent with everything. Townhomes are spacious parking isn't the best however you do get a two car garage.
reviews.response_text: Your positive experience with Mikayla and Angel is greatly appreciated. Thank you for sharing your feedback on the spacious townhomes and two-car garage. Let us know if you need anything!

reviews.author: Julian Hodge
reviews.text: I am so impressed with everything about this community, most importantly the management and staff. Mikayla ( I hope I'm spelling it right) was so responsive, knowledgeable, helpful, hardworking, and committed to highest quality standards. The grounds are impeccably maintained and the buildings are well constructed and maintained. The location is close to shopping and transportation. I highly recommend The Quinci for your next apartment home.
reviews.response_text: We are delighted to hear about your positive experience at theQUINCI. Thank you for recommending us!

reviews.author: Nestor Lopez
reviews.text: Nice services. Happy my new home.!@@!!!!!!!!
reviews.response_text: Thank you Nestor for your review! We are so happy you are loving your new home!

reviews.text: Mikaela and staff are amazing we are very happy here
reviews.response_text: We're happy to hear that Mikayla and staff are amazing! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us, Tony! Don't hesitate to reach out if you need anything.

reviews.author: Traci Hales
reviews.text: Mikayla is amazing. She really went above and beyond to help me get moved in. Once moved in, maintenance has been great responding to issues in my new unit. Very happy with everything so far!
reviews.response_text: Thank you, Traci, for the wonderful 5-star review! reviews.response_text: theQUINCI is so lucky to have you as a resident, Greatly! You have been so much fun to work with, and I'm so happy we were able to find you your new home. Thank you so much for being a part of our community.

reviews.author: הודיה צדוק
reviews.text: The Quincy is an amazing place! It’s very clean, the leasing office is great to work with
reviews.response_text: Thank you so much for submitting your review! We absolutely love having you here at theQUINCI!

reviews.author: kalolaine takai
reviews.text: We were probably one of the first residents who moved into the Quinci. So far it’s been amazing. The staff is quick every time there’s a question or a simple solution to a small problem. Brittani is also good with communication and it just makes it easier as a resident when there’s good communication.
reviews.response_text: Thank you so much for your review! We truly care for our residents, and you have been such a great resident. We're happy you are a part of theQUINCI Community.

reviews.author: Kesha Tucker-Dean
reviews.text: It’s under new management and the ladies are AWESOME!!!!

reviews.author: Lindsey Havemann
reviews.text: I lived here when Discovery first opened! I have always loved this community. Great location!

reviews.author: Mrs. Hernandez
reviews.text: My husband and I have been living here for almost two years and we love it! The environment is very quiet, and well maintained. The property staff are welcoming, respectful, and helpful which most importantly adds to this experience. Overall, Discovery has been an enjoyable experience and we would recommend this community to others!
reviews.response_text: Greetings, thank you for making our community your home for over two years. Nothing makes us happier than knowing our residents love their homes! It is great to know that you are impressed with our peaceful, well-maintained living environment and the helpful service that we provide. Your high recommendation means the world to us. Take care.

reviews.author: Christina Haynes
reviews.text:
I’ve lived here now over a year and decided to renew my lease. I’m for the most part happy to live here still. My car and few others did get their wheels stolen and left on blocks last January though so there’s that incident. The gates are pretty much a false sense of  security as anyone can get in, but that would be at any apartment complex with gates that stay open past your own car pulling in.

I did mention in my review a year ago that residents here have no responsibility over their pets and picking up their waste. That hasn’t changed. As for my individual apartment, I still like it and it still feels like home. I would still recommend this complex.
reviews.response_text: Greetings, Christina, we are honored that you have made our community your home for over a year and plan to continue living here! It is important to us that our residents feel at ease in our community, so we are sorry to hear of your concerns with the gates. It sounds like we also need to remind everyone to be considerate of others and pick up after their pets. However, we are glad that you enjoy your home and would recommend us to others. If you would like to discuss your concerns further, please reach out to us at discoverygm@nolanred.com.

reviews.author: tbewin1 z
reviews.text: I was on an apartment hunt and saw many properties in inly a short amount of time.  The staff at Discovery (Jianelle) were great and answered all my questions. My experience with this property was better than many of the others.
reviews.response_text: Hello, thank you for sharing that you had a great experience with Jianelle during your search for a new home! We are glad that she answered all of your questions and provided excellent service. Please let us know if there is anything else we can help you with.

reviews.author: C W
reviews.text: Today I’d placed a work order to paint my exterior door as the outside elements had worn it a bit as I wanted to prepare to entertain visitors for the holidays. Mike, one of the maintenance personnel completed the job on today as well! It was a pleasant surprise and Ms. Jianell the property manager reached out as well to inform to give an fyi in the event I got a Vivent security entry message, it was Mike. One thing that makes this property standout is the promptness of attention to maintenance requests. Keep up the great work! It’s been very comfortable making Discovery home!
reviews.response_text: Greetings, we are pleased to hear that our prompt service stands out to you! Thank you for acknowledging Mike’s excellent work painting your exterior door and Jianell’s follow-up. We hope you enjoy your visitors for the holidays. Take care.

reviews.author: Mustafa Chohan
reviews.text: Freddy and his team  is  always there when something breaks down in my apartment. Excellent service and timings.
reviews.response_text: Mustafa, thank you for recognizing Freddy and the rest of our team for being so attentive when you require service! You can expect this same excellent customer service each time you reach out to us.

reviews.author: Jayla Swain
reviews.text: I’ve been living here for about 1 year and 4 months now and it’s an amazing complex to be in. From the beginning, all the staff that I met helped me to have a seamless move-in. The maintenance staff are also super helpful, especially Fredis. 5/5 stars all around!
reviews.response_text: Thank you for making our community your home for over a year, Jayla! It is wonderful to know that you have been so impressed with our helpful team, especially Fredis. If there is anything we can assist you with in the future, do not hesitate to reach out to us.

reviews.author: Lays Molina
reviews.text: Fredis did a great job fixing the heater for me. We deserves a raise
reviews.response_text: Hi Lays, we appreciate you sharing that Fredis did a wonderful job resolving your heater concerns! We will be sure to pass along your kind words. Please let us know if we can assist you with anything in the future.

reviews.author: Thanna A
reviews.response_text: Thank you for your 5-star rating, Thanna! We are glad you enjoyed your experience with us.

reviews.author: M H
reviews.text: First time I've lived in an apartment in YEARS, and I love it! The office staff is friendly and SO patient. The complex is well-maintained and quiet. The maintenance team is outstanding!! Thank you, Discovery Team!
reviews.response_text: What a fantastic review, thank you! We are thrilled to hear that you have enjoyed everything that our community has to offer, from our friendly and dependable team to the tranquility of our spaces. Please let us know if there is anything we can do for you.

reviews.author: Christy Jordan
reviews.text: Jennifer and her office personnel and Freddie and his maintenance crew are just awesome. The whole team truly cares about the quality of life at Discovery. I would recommend them to any of my friends and family looking for an apartment.
reviews.response_text: Hello Christy, thank you for recognizing Jennifer and Freddie for providing exceptional service! We truly care about our residents, and we are glad you noticed. Your high recommendation for our community means the world to us. Take care.

reviews.author: Karen R
reviews.text: Freddi is always so sweet and efficient! We love him (:
reviews.response_text: Thank you for letting us know you love Freddi’s personality and efficient service, Karen! We will be sure to pass along your kind words.

reviews.author: Kamanda Gaines (Kam)
reviews.text: Absolutely amazing place love the support from the leasing office. Jianell H. especially was really helpful she even stayed in office to finalize my application and make sure all my questions were answered.
reviews.response_text: Hello Kamanda, we appreciate you sharing how helpful Jianell was with your application! It is our pleasure to provide exceptional customer service to our residents and guests. Please let us know if you have any additional questions. Take care.

reviews.author: Jake B
reviews.text: Says the office closes at 6:00. I get off work and get here at 5:30. Waited for 30 minutes on the office person that wasn’t there. Clearly this place doesn’t want business, so I will go somewhere else.

reviews.author: marissa danielson
reviews.text: Jianell was very helpful walking us through the application, making sure we got exactly what we were looking for, and accommodated our needs!
reviews.response_text: Thank you for recognizing Jianell for being so helpful with the application process, Marissa! We are happy to hear that she helped you get exactly what you needed. Should you have any additional needs, please do not hesitate to reach out to us.

reviews.author: Tasia McCue
reviews.text: Jianell is fantastic! Smoothest moving process I've ever been through. The tour was great and the property itself is gorgeous.
reviews.response_text: Tasia, it is wonderful to hear that you had the smoothest moving process in our community that you have ever had! Thank you for sharing that you had an excellent tour and that Jianell made a positive impact on you with her helpful service. Please let us know if there is anything we can assist you with in the future.

reviews.author: Kirk Jordan
reviews.text: I wanted to let everybody know that Discovery Apartments take the best care of their tenants. Five star on every level! The office is extremely professional and Freddie, the maintenance supervisor, is the best! No body takes care of their tenants better!
reviews.response_text: Hi Kirk, we appreciate you taking the time to share your lovely comments about our team! Professional and courteous service is something we pride ourselves on delivering to our residents, so your acknowledgment means a lot to Freddie and all of us.

reviews.author: Jamey Jordan
reviews.text: The apartments are great! Everyone is always friendly and Freddie is a great guy!
reviews.response_text: Jamey, thank you very much for recognizing Freddie for his caring and attentive service. We have worked hard to cultivate a team of capable professionals who keep our community running smoothly, and your kind words validate our efforts. We appreciate your 5-star support!

reviews.author: Tavaris
reviews.text: Fredis did a excellent job
reviews.response_text: Hello Tavaris, we are proud to have such an excellent team serving our community, and Freddie certainly exemplifies our high standards! We look forward to passing your compliments along to him.

reviews.author: alex hernandez
reviews.text: The property is beautiful inside and out! The apartments are spacious and reasonably priced. The office team is stellar — they manage the complex efficiently and create a wonderful sense of community through monthly resident events. It’s also very pet-friendly with great neighbors. I’m truly enjoying living here!
reviews.response_text: Alex, taking great care of you is our priority. We appreciate your kind words for our team's readiness to go the extra mile and for the welcoming atmosphere we strive to foster for our residents and their pets. Thank you!

reviews.author: Fabio Jimenez
reviews.text: Maintenance is amazing. Freddy and Tony from the maintenance team are amazing! They’re always quick to respond, professional, and go above and beyond to get things done right. They explain what they’re doing, make sure everything’s working perfectly, and leave the area spotless. Big thanks to both of them for keeping Discovery at Kingwood running smoothly!
reviews.response_text: Fabio, our maintenance team takes their role seriously and always aims for service that goes the extra mile. Your glowing review of Freddy and Tony's workmanship, attentiveness, and friendly service will make their day. Thank you!

reviews.author: Sabino Zagaria
reviews.text: One of the worst housing experiences of my life. Moving from Italy for work, I was asked for an exorbitantly high security deposit (still unrefunded) and countless other incidentals to find an apartment that was, to say the least, unsightly, dirty, full of black dust, and smelly. In three months, I called maintenance numerous times because the appliances (washing machine, A/C, dishwasher, etc.) weren't working or were leaking, but each time I was told nothing was broken and they promptly returned a second time to replace the appliances. The owner and maintenance staff entered the apartment numerous times without me being there, and on a couple of occasions I found the bathroom flooded and the floor filthy and dirty. The only time management contacted me (I've never had the pleasure of meeting anyone from management) was via email to demand I pay $3,500 to avoid a bad rental record. I'm leaving the apartment at the end of November and am counting down the days until this nightmare is over. I strongly advise against staying here.

reviews.author: Yulianni Gonzalez
reviews.text: Sin nada que agregar me voy de aquí insatisfecha no recomiendo este sitio

reviews.author: Ivan Gonzalez
reviews.text: My wife and I have been residents for 2 years. Everything has gone well until it was time for us to leave. We are aware that we were supposed to give a 60-day notice before moving out, but we still provided 43 days’ notice before our lease ended. Due to personal issues, we couldn’t do it on time—my wife is pregnant and at risk of preterm labor, and we’ve had to be in the hospital several times. They are charging us an extra $1,100 because of the 60-day notice policy. We have been exemplary residents and have never had any kind of complaint! We are very disappointed with these apartments—we feel robbed.Please keep this in mind before moving out or in

reviews.author: Caroline Richardson
reviews.text: My son locked me out. He dead bolted  the door from inside so i was locked out.The maintenance really helped me out.I was really worried but am glad they came through and fixed the situation
reviews.response_text: Caroline, thank you for reviewing our community. We are sorry to hear about your son locking you out of your home, but we are glad that our team was able to assist you in getting back in. You can expect this same level of excellent service each time you reach out to us. Please let us know if there is anything else we can help you with.

reviews.author: Colby Kesler
reviews.text: As always, Fred and the maintenance team are an incredible help that solve issues fast.
reviews.response_text: Colby, it is great to hear that you can rely on Fred for providing prompt service to resolve your concerns! Thank you for your kind words. We will be sure to pass this along to him.

reviews.author: Antonio Martinez
reviews.text: Jianell was amazing and very accommodating  10/10 great staff
reviews.response_text: Antonio, thank you for recognizing Jianell for being so attentive and helpful! You can expect this same kind of service each time you reach out to our team. Take care.

reviews.author: Aaron Carreon
reviews.text: The best of maintenance guys this whole time I've been here 🙌 👏 and just last night fixed my a/c after normal business hours and fast awesome attitude and just grateful for the maintenance team great job guys my year ends this November its BEEN A HUGE HONOR STAYING 🎖
reviews.response_text: Aaron, we are happy to hear that you have noticed the excellent service our team offers! Thank you for recognizing our efforts to resolve your air conditioning concerns after business hours. You can expect this same level of service each time you reach out to our team. Take care.

reviews.author: Janay Lewis
reviews.text: So far, I love living here! The community is beautiful and quiet, and the staff is always so helpful. I truly appreciate how they’ve made my experience here such a great one!
reviews.response_text: How lovely to know you are enjoying your peaceful home with us, Janay! Thank you for brightening our day with your kind words. Our team is always available to you, so please continue to reach out when you need us.

reviews.author: Maria Chavez
reviews.text: He tenido una muy buena experiencia en Discovery at Kingwood. Los apartamentos están bien cuidados, el área es tranquila y agradable, y el personal siempre ha sido atento y servicial. La ubicación también es muy conveniente, con fácil acceso a tiendas y restaurantes. Recomiendo este lugar a quienes buscan un hogar cómodo y seguro en Kingwood
reviews.response_text: María, ¡tu recomendación de nuestra comunidad, convenientemente ubicada, es muy importante para nosotros! Gracias por compartir que tuviste una excelente experiencia y disfrutas de la tranquilidad de nuestro entorno. Nuestro equipo se esfuerza por brindar un servicio atento, así que nos alegra que hayas notado nuestros esfuerzos. Cuídate.

reviews.author: Jeff Just Jeff
reviews.text: This community is amazing and it all starts with management. Things get handled properly and professionally and most importantly quickly. If you're looking for a new home stop in a check them out for yourself you won't be disappointed.

reviews.response_text: Thank you for rating our community five stars, Yandro! We are proud of the excellent service and welcoming environment our team provides, and we are glad to see that we have earned a top-notch rating from you.

reviews.text: Long time résident and love it here
reviews.response_text: Hi Daniel, we are honored that you have been a loyal resident in our community! Thank you for taking a moment to review our community. Take care.

reviews.author: Dayana
reviews.text: I’ve been here for over 6 months now. My application process was very smooth and quick! My apartment is decent. I really like how quiet it is around here! Elementary at walking distance is a HUGE win for me! Maintenance always handled in a timely manner! I love that we have a security system for our apartment and how easy it was to set that up as well. Staff is always kind and ready to help. The gym is nice and big as well as the pool area. What I use on the daily is the Starbucks coffee machine! I have to make a run to the leasing office about every morning to get me a cup or two! I love that I can do that saves me so much! The Starbucks coffee machine also has Chai Tea Latte which is my fav drink from Starbucks, this saves me so much money! Win Win!
reviews.response_text: Dayana, we are so glad to know that our Starbucks coffee machine makes every day a little more special! Our team loves finding ways to deliver a superior living experience. Thank you for complimenting our responsiveness and professionalism, and our convenient amenities. We are delighted to have you as part of our community.

reviews.author: Claudia Castillo
reviews.text: Amazing resident welcoming! Jenelle goes over and beyond for future and current residents. Extremely professional! Community is super clean and well taken care of. Friendly staff!
reviews.response_text: We are thrilled to hear that you have felt welcome in our community, Claudia! We want you to truly feel at home here, and we know that friendly and professional service plays a large part in your comfort. We look forward to continuing to assist you, so please reach out anytime we can lend a hand. Thank you!

reviews.text: The location is perfect—close to everything you need—and the amenities are top-notch. The apartment itself is bright and spacious. The staff is friendly and always quick to help. Definitely a place you’ll enjoy coming home to. I lived here for 4 years.

reviews.text: The checking in process was made easy and simple. The apartments are stylish and modern, rooms were also cleant before arrival which was great. The staff were friendly and helpful which takes the stress away especially after a long day of travelling. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.author: nozipho shabangu
reviews.text: Been staying at Luna(since 2020, when it was still City Life Premium), The have really improved a whole lot of things. The rooms are immaculate but the Rules are just too much for employed people. The limitation on the number of people and the time limit on visitors is their only downfall.. The fact that LUNA accommodates grown adults that are working it should give you the freedom to sign your visitors if and when you want too. Even if we have to pay for a visitor that needs to check out at 10am that I signed in at 3am its ok… honestly thats their only downfall… the visitors part, the limitation on daily visitors should go back to 2 and the time should be unlimited, like it was when they first introduced the app. R110 is nothing just to accommodate family/or whoever that arrives at Luna. As long as the money is paid.

reviews.author: Brian Simelane
reviews.text: I've been staying in Luna Apartments for 3 years and I don't see myself moving out anytime soon, excellent service and a peace of mind. ❤️

reviews.author: Nolwazi Manyanga
reviews.text: Very horrible. I mean I only have a month staying at Luna. When I moved in I told them I did not like the room they gave me it was nothing to what they showed me when I came to view the place. Asked them to change rooms when the month ends because when I moved in apparently the room they gave me was the only room left. Now they making me pay ANOTHER admin fee of R550. I was told that the admin fee is just a once off why am I paying it again? Poor service, I’ve been telling them I want to change rooms but now they telling me that they need to assist the new comers first then they’ll get back to me? What is that????

reviews.author: Joe Denison
reviews.text: I've had a great experience so far here. Great community events, the complex is nice and the area has a lot of restaurants nearby. Highly recommend if you are interested in moving to Denver.

reviews.text: I’ve had a great experience at Park17 Apartments. The community is clean, quiet, and well maintained, and the apartments are comfortable and modern. Management has been professional and responsive whenever I’ve needed anything, and maintenance requests are handled promptly. The location is convenient and makes getting around easy. Overall, Park17 is a great place to live and I would definitely recommend it.

Ross Arabie

reviews.author: Andrea Ayala
reviews.text:
We’ve really loved living at the Park 17. Everyone who works in this community is absolutely lovely, we’ve been fortunate to have found them. The move in process was easy (as easy as a move can be), the gym got new equipment shortly after we moved in, the facilities are really clean and maintenance requests are addressed quickly.

After facing rather unfriendly staff at our previous building, the Park 17 team has made us feel right at home.
reviews.response_text:
Thank you for sharing your experience! We’re so glad your move-in went smoothly and that you feel at home here at Park 17. Our team truly appreciates having you as part of our community!

reviews.author: Rebecca Bowman
reviews.text:
Updating! (1.5 years into living here)
This is still the best spot to live- the amenities have been recently upgraded and the whole team is just stellar in every aspect. It is maintained well and in a great location with a new restaurant that opened next door.
Jeffrey and Janine are so attentive and helpful, they ensure the community is one of the best in town. Will is also super helpful with any maintenance requests and is so fast!
Park 17 is awesome!

Been a resident here for nearly 4 months and so far it has been a great experience, Jeffrey and Janine are awesome and made the move in process easy and were very accommodating. They are fast to respond to inquiries and the building is well maintained/clean. It is in a great spot downtown if you have a pet as the neighborhood is dog friendly for walks. The amenities are nice and my favorite part is how friendly and welcoming the residents here are. Everyone is always willing to lend a hand whether it be with heavy packages or even holding a door open. Great community to live in.
reviews.response_text:

Thank you so much for your 5-star review! Your kind words truly made our day. Janine and I are thrilled to hear that you’ve had a great experience so far! We take pride in maintaining a clean and welcoming community, and it’s wonderful to know you and Draco are happy here. If you ever need anything, please don’t hesitate to reach out. Thank you again for sharing your positive experience!

Best regards,

Jeff Carara
Community Director
jeffrey@liveatpark17.com

We would highly recommend living here to any of our friends, and we’ve already had a couple move into the building. 😉

reviews.author: Isable Hughes
reviews.text: I have a friend who lives at this complex and if I could afford it I would 100% live here too! He invites me to all of their events because I love them so much (pool parties, sexy Santa, happy hour, are a few of my favorites).  I have met their property manager, Jeff, on multiple occasions and he is alway so nice and bubbly. I look forward to seeing him every time I'm there.  You're all lucky to have him as the face and my gf is lucky to live in such a fun, safe, and loving community-that always smells so good!  I look forward to more events!
reviews.response_text:
Thank you for the kind words Isable! it means the world that you feel connected to the community, even as a guest. I’m so glad you’ve joined us and we’re lucky to have you as part of the extended Park 17 fam! Can’t wait for more fun ahead.

Jeff Carara

reviews.author: Brandon Dazzo
reviews.text: I am from Colorado and can tell you that Park 17 is one of the best apartments in Denver. Jeff and his team are always available and happy to help. They do a great job of hosting great community events. If you are looking to be in a great location, with a community that is mature, yet fun and social, this place is for you. You can't beat the pool either! Highly recommend.

Brandon, you’re the best! Thank you for the love! It means a lot coming from a Colorado local and we’re so glad you’re feeling the Park 17 vibe. Appreciate the kind words about our team and events. Please le tme know if you need anything.

Jeff Carara

reviews.text: We love our home here at Park 17! The staff is so friendly and we have a great sense of community! Everyone seems to get along and respect each other...for the most part! We will definitely be renewing our lease! The manager Jeffrey really seems to care about the building and each person who lives here! I would recommend moving here!

reviews.text: Park17 is a beautiful community, and Jeff is truly wonderful! He’s always friendly, helpful, and goes above and beyond to make the experience smooth and welcoming. Highly recommend!

reviews.author: Larry Goldenberg
reviews.text: Maintenance is always responsive. Jeff, the head management honcho is great. The building is very secure and well maintained. Lots of friendly dogs, too!

Thank you so much, Larry! I really appreciate the kind words. It means a lot knowing you’re happy here at Park 17. Residents like you are what make this place such a great community, and I’m so glad you’ve made it your home. I'm always here if you ever need anything!

Jeff Carara

reviews.author: A Lou
reviews.text:
I am a current resident & have renewed the lease because of how much of a hit this property is for denver.
starting with the staff- jeanine, jeff, darren, will, all of the cleaning staff… you ALL make this experience so peaceful & hard to leave.
you are catered to the minute you walk in the door making sure you feel at home and treat you like a neighbor.
we kinda landed on this place sight unseen and it couldn’t have felt more serendipitous.
the amenities are there, the views?!? (check their insta @liveatpark17 and you will see what i’m talking about…) and there’s livable spaces for all kinds of needs and sizes. added- it’s one of the more well maintained dog friendly apartments in the area, too. the trash is handled and the garages stay clean for being in the city. they also will make extra efforts to help build and keep the community strong, inside and outside of the property. I have met so many wonderful neighbors even showing up late to said events!

if you start to feel cooped up, you have a whirlwind of businesses and activities of all kind to check out right next door or across the street, branching out more into the neighborhoods also is worth it. :)
it’s walking distance from the hospital and many medical services, 1mile downhill walk to downtown for us folks still in office, transit is nearby, too, and very easy to use! the farmer’s market is a hit this time of year and is also walking/biking distance (protected bike lanes on 16th a block over!). parks around park too! :)

the neighborhood is alive and i’d love for you to become my new neighbor.

I hope this review helps you check off the boxes you need for your searching.
it’s definitely always worth reaching out to the crew to see how they can meet your needs (EVEN AS A CURRENT RESIDENT! this leasing office and maintenance want to keep your experience comfortable! talk to them!).

PS i’m sorry staff for taking so long to write this out, but you know I love y’all :) -Audri
reviews.response_text:
Audri!! This just made our whole week! Thank you for taking the time to share such a heartfelt review. We're beyond grateful to have you as part of the Park 17 family—your energy brings so much light to the community! We’ll keep doing our part to make Park 17 feel like home-sweet-home—and we’re always here if you need anything at all.

With appreciation,
Jeff Carara
Community Director

reviews.author: Savannah Harrington
reviews.text: The maintenance team here is amazing, especially Will! He always provides friendly and attentive service! Any maintenance issues we have had are quickly resolved. Thanks Will!
reviews.response_text:
Hi Savannah,
Thank you SO much for the amazing 5-star review! We’re beyond thrilled to hear your shoutout for Will—he really is a Park 17 legend, and we love having him on the team. 
It means a lot that you took the time to share your experience. We're always here if you need anything, and we’re so lucky to have residents like you! 
Best,
Jeff Carara
Community Director

reviews.author: Justin Fritsche
reviews.text:
Visited a friend at Park 17 and was genuinely impressed by the vibe here. The pool area is gorgeous—sleek design, cozy lounge seating, and a modern fire feature that adds the perfect touch of warmth and ambiance. It’s the kind of space that makes you want to kick back, unwind, and stay awhile.

Even as a guest, you can tell the community is well-maintained and thoughtfully designed. Everything feels clean, calm, and elevated without trying too hard.

If you’re looking for a place in Denver that blends comfort, style, and great amenities, Park 17 definitely makes a strong impression.
reviews.response_text:
Justin, this review made our day! We're so glad you could feel the vibe. We designed Park 17 to be the perfect blend of comfort, calm, and style, and it means the world that it came through in your visit.

We’d absolutely love to welcome you home if you ever decide to make the leap and lease with us. Until then, keep kicking back and soaking in those good vibes whenever you visit.
Best,
Jeff Carara
Community Director

reviews.author: Lexy Silva
reviews.text: Park 17 is an amazing place to live. I have lived in Denver for over 10 years now and Park 17 is by far my favorite apartment building I have ever lived in. Janine and Jeff (the office staff) are wonderful. Their responses are fast when I have a question, they are kind and respectful, and they help create a safe, fun, community feel to the apartment building. The apartment itself was high quality and quiet and the neighborhood is great. Highly recommend!
reviews.response_text:
Thank you, Lexy! We are truly grateful to have had you as part of our vibrant community. You will definitely be missed! Our doors are always open if you ever decide to come back home. Wishing you all the best, and thanks again for the glowing review!

Best,
Jeff Carara
Community Director

reviews.text: It's nicely located in Denver Uptown health care/hospital neighborhood. Walking distance from the greenery in my favorite Denver parks and shops and restaurants on vibrant E 17th Ave. The building has a nice swimming pool area and open lounge that are always clean and pretty impressive to show your friends. The on-site management team is usually around and very helpful. Very inclusive community vibe.
reviews.response_text:
Thank you so much, Masaru, for your glowing review! We're thrilled to hear you're loving the vibe. We’re so grateful to have you as part of our vibrant community!  If there’s ever anything we can do to make your experience even better, don’t hesitate to let us know.
Warm regards,
Jeff Carara
Community Director

reviews.author: Tiffany Prince
reviews.text: I am a current resident at Park 17, and I couldn’t be happier living here! The building is always clean and well-maintained, and there are fun activities that create a sense of community. I also feel safe and secure, which is a top priority for me. Jeffrey and Janine have been amazing—polite, professional, and incredibly friendly since the day I signed my lease. Their dedication truly makes a difference. If you’re looking for a great place to live, I highly recommend Park 17!

We’re lucky to have amazing residents like you, and your kind words about Janine and I truly mean the world. If there’s ever anything we can do to make your experience even better, just let us know!
Warm regards,
Jeff Carara
Community Director

reviews.text: Moved in last September and can’t say enough good things about living here. The building is clean, not too big, has great amenities and super helpful friendly staff. Highly recommend

If there’s ever anything we can do to make your experience here even better, we’re always here for you.

Jeff Carara

The community amenities are great, just hoping they get a pool table soon! Overall great place to live.

reviews.text: The leasing staff are all super friendly and helpful. The property is maintained beautifully and it’s the best location I’ve ever lived in Denver. So many cool restaurants and bars within walking distance.  Free coffee, a pool, and a gym. It’s got the works!!!

It's hard to find solid apartment complexes anymore where the staff truly cares, and I would say this place certainly stands out above the rest. Top to bottom, the best apartment community that I've ever lived in.

Monthly resident events that are always fun & engaging. Great maintenance staff, responds within 24 hours. Parking garage & bike storage room are far more secure than other places I have lived.

reviews.text:

reviews.author: Josh Shelley
reviews.text:
I moved into Ridian apartments 6 months ago. I intentionally waited until I’ve lived here for a while to leave a review because I rely on these type of reviews when making an important decision like
signing a year and a half long lease and I’m sure other people do too. That being said, after living here since June, I can confidently give Ridian 5 stars and recommend it 100% for anyone looking to move to LoHi.

To begin, the building is brand new and very high-end. You get top-of-the-line appliances and finishes. For a smaller community, you also still get very nice amenities- the gym is fantastic, the pool and hot tub areas are great, and the rooftop grill and fire pit are sweet. (Especially the downtown view!) Just as important is the staff. Hanna is the best in the game, hands down. She leads with intention and care and makes sure that residents truly feel at home. I’ve been impressed since day 1. I’ve not had any issues that require maintenance, but I’ve heard neighbors speak highly of Wes and his response times. So that’s very assuring to me.

Finally, let’s talk about the neighborhood. 33rd and Eliot is IDEAL. It’s quiet here and you’re half a mile in each direction from all things LoHi and all things Highlands Square. You’re also very close to Tennyson. People are always on walks and runs and bike rides. I often bike to work downtown and it takes me 8 mins, which is awesome.

Very glad I moved into Ridian and hope to call it home for a while! Again, I think lots of people rely on these reviews to make important decisions and I’ve proud to be able to give this community honest, praise-worthy feedback.
reviews.response_text: Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a thoughtful review, Josh. It really means a lot to hear that your experience has continued to be positive over time, especially knowing how important reviews are when making a decision like this. I’m grateful for your kind words about the team and the community, and we’re so glad Ridian feels like home for you. We truly appreciate you being part of it.

reviews.response_text: Thank you for sharing your experience, Greg. We’re glad to hear you’ve enjoyed the amenities, location, and community, and we appreciate your patience as we worked through those initial items. reviews.text: I’ve really enjoyed living at this apartment complex. The apartments themselves are beautiful and modern, with thoughtful details that make them feel like home. reviews.response_text: We are ecstatic to hear about your wonderful experience at Pearl Lantana! Thank you for sharing your feedback.

reviews.author: Javier Cantu
reviews.text:
We lived here for over a little over a year, and it's a truly incredible place. The apartments are beautiful, the amenities are great (having three pools is amazing!), and the staff is exceptional. Andre and Stacey have always been incredibly kind and attentive to our needs. I don’t have any complaints—only compliments for them and the entire team.

Any maintenance request was handled quickly and done well. We once had an issue with our water heater, and the staff went above and beyond to make sure it was resolved. That’s just one example of the many positive experiences we’ve had here.

Our family is sad to leave, but very grateful for the time we spent here. It’s a peaceful community with an excellent location. Highly recommend!
reviews.response_text: Thanks for sharing your positive experience at Pearl Lantana! We deeply respect your kind words about our staff and amenities. Your feedback helps us improve.

reviews.author: Sarah Reicher
reviews.text: Living at Pearl Lantana has been such a great experience. The staff is incredibly friendly, always welcoming you with a smile and making the community feel warm and inviting. The maintenance team is outstanding! They are quick to respond, knowledgeable, and always willing to go above and beyond to make sure everything is taken care of. You can really tell that everyone here takes pride in their work and genuinely cares about the residents.

reviews.author: Trevor McKertcher
reviews.text:
Pearl Lantana doesn’t feel like an apartment complex — it feels like a luxury resort. The atmosphere is relaxed, the grounds are beautiful, and the staff is consistently excellent and genuinely friendly. Some of my most peaceful moments here have been simply enjoying the nighttime vibes around the property.

What really stands out is how personal every interaction feels. The staff greets you like familiar faces rather than treating you like just another number. They put real effort into building a sense of community, and it shows.

The resident events are a great touch and make it easy to meet people. We’ve enjoyed everything from poolside movie nights with snacks, to pool parties, to bagels & Bloody Mary’s, to the Halloween martini mixer. These little things add up and make the whole place feel warm and welcoming.

The office and common areas are always inviting as well. The holiday decorations — especially at Christmas — make it feel more like a home than a standard apartment community. You can tell the staff treats this place like their own second home.

The location is another major perk. It’s an easy walk to Black Rock Coffee, Playa Bowls, and plenty of other retail spots. I’m often out early in the morning and always see people walking, running, or out with their dogs along Rialto Blvd. If you cross into the nearby residential area, you’ll find quiet neighborhoods with routes that let you get 3 to 6 miles in with minimal traffic.

Commuting is also convenient, with quick access to Loop 1, 360, 71, and 290 — all within about five minutes.

Pearl Lantana truly feels like a community where people enjoy living. Thank you for a great experience. The only reason we’re leaving is due to a work relocation — otherwise we would stay much longer.
reviews.response_text: We're delighted to hear about your positive experience at Pearl Lantana. We work hard to ensure Pearl Lantana is a community not just another apartment and it's heartwarming to hear that residents can see this! Thank you so much for your feedback and we wish you all the best!

reviews.author: Michael Sabatini
reviews.text:
Andre is amazing, genuine and exceptional in his attention to detail. As a member of the neighboring community it has always been a joy engaging Andre and how we can improve our experiences. Thank you Andre!!!

And once again, the maintenance team members, Salinas and Justin, are spreading the holiday cheer by delivering a package that was misdelivered to Pearl Lantana. Spreading the holiday spirit comes so easily for these guys. Thank you SO very much!
reviews.response_text: We are grateful for your kind words about Andre's exceptional attention to detail and recognizing our amazing Service Team!

reviews.text: Pearl Lantana is the best of Austin! It welcomes you to a peaceful community with beautiful views and lovely living accommodations which are well maintained, clean, upscale and modern including the pools, gym and grounds. While these are the attractions, the staff are the reason to call PL home! Stacey and Andre (management team) are the constants and impeccable leaders with their attention and care to small and large details, concerns and safety. Compassion, professionalism, respect , friendliness and kindness are just a few of their attributes along with their entire staff, Maintenance included! Maintenance is handled extremely well and promptly as are any and all issues or concerns. As an Austinite who truly appreciates the beauty that surrounds us and people who care, I highly recommend Pearl Lantana as your next home!
reviews.response_text: Thanks S Jones! We're honored by your recommendation and grateful for Stacey and Andre's dedicated leadership creating your peaceful home.

reviews.author: RJ Hungry
reviews.text:
An Honest and Grateful Review of The Pearl Lantana

After moving city to city and experiencing my fair share of disappointing apartment complexes, The Pearl Lantana truly felt like a home away from home. I lived here for about two years, and from day one, I knew this place was different.

The Property:
The community is always clean, peaceful, and well-maintained—this isn’t a place where things get patched up with temporary fixes. Every improvement, every upgrade, feels intentional and genuinely made with the residents in mind. It's not just a place where things work—it’s a place that’s beautiful to come home to.

Amenities:
The gym has everything you need for a full-body workout, and the pool areas (especially the central “family pool”) are perfect for grilling, relaxing, or just soaking in a good day. I never had recurring issues with anything on-site—if something ever needed attention, it was addressed immediately. Even the one time the grill gave us trouble, it was up and running again the next day.

Maintenance:
Hands down one of the most reliable and respectful maintenance teams I’ve ever encountered. They often completed service requests the same day, and if not, it was handled the next. Never once did I feel ignored or brushed off—they take pride in their work and treat every apartment like it’s their own.

The Units:
Modern, clean, and thoughtfully designed. I especially loved the spacious kitchens and the overall luxury feel. It really is a pleasure walking through your door and feeling proud of your space.

Safety:
No theft, no unwanted visitors, and no signs of homelessness on property. That sense of security meant a lot to me and made it feel safe for anyone—whether you’re living alone, with a partner, or starting a family.

The Heart of the Property—The Staff:
This is what truly sets The Pearl Lantana apart. Andre and Emma (and the rest of the amazing team—whose names I wish I remembered!) don’t just do their jobs—they build community. They remember your name, your apartment, your story. You’re never just a tenant here. They treat you like a neighbor, a friend, and sometimes even like family. I’ve never had a property staff go so far above and beyond, and for that, I’ll always be grateful.

Only One Suggestion:
If I had to name one critique—it’s the speed demons driving through the property. A few more speed bumps wouldn’t hurt.

To Andre, Emma, and the entire team: thank you for everything. You’ve built something special here, and it shows. I’ll always look back on my time at The Pearl Lantana with appreciation and fondness.

—Ronald
reviews.response_text: We are pleased to hear about your wonderful experience, Ronald! Thank you for recognizing our team's dedication to creating community. We strive to make The Pearl Lantana a true home for all our residents, and it's heartening to know that our efforts have made such a positive impact during your two-year stay. We appreciate your kind words about our property maintenance, amenities, and especially our staff. Andre, Emma, and the entire team work hard to ensure everyone feels welcomed and valued. Your feedback is invaluable to us, and we're grateful for the time you've taken to share your thoughts. We wish you all the best in your future endeavors.

reviews.text:
We lived at Pearl Lantana for just over a year, and it was a very peaceful experience. The management team was always helpful and accommodating. The gym, pool, and clubhouse were consistently clean and serene — we hosted many gatherings there and made some truly wonderful memories.

One memorable experience stands out: one night around 9:30 pm, our climate control system stopped working. We contacted maintenance, and they responded promptly. While they couldn’t fix the issue immediately, they provided us with additional coolers to keep us comfortable through the night. By the next day, the problem was fully resolved.

Overall, living at Pearl Lantana was a fantastic experience. I would highly recommend it to anyone seeking a calm, well-maintained community.

reviews.author: Andrew Billingsley
reviews.text:
Not terrible, but not great either. The actual unit I have is fine, happy with it, wasn't cleaned properly by the time I arrived but can look past it (just some scruffs and finger marks on appliances). Community is nice and inviting, and its pretty quiet. Seems like working professionals around the same age group. Its a good part of town too. Wish the parking situation for guests (or lackthereof) could be improved but given where it is in town this isn't really management's fault or problem to be fair, and the unit is nice enough to again overlook that.

The elevator closest to my unit doesn't work, and the one that does work is painfully slow. I just take the stairs now to the 4th floor but sill given the price I'd expect that to be done. Also was a pain for the movers and as a result I probably ended up paying a little more than originally anticipated. Again, can overlook this for the time being assuming the other elevator will be fixed (believe it will be based on communication I've received)

The leasing office itself leaves a bit to be desired. I'm not sure what the capacity the building(s) is (are) currently at, but it's certainly nowhere near full, so the fact they get overwhelmed with simple things like parking is pretty concerning. Today I was told by the Director via email that I wasn't permitted to park in the garage and wasn't part of my lease (it is actually part of my lease, they later confirmed it), and that I would be towed if I don't add it to my lease by 3:00PM (of course no apology for the threat).

Then the assistant director called me separately at around almost the exact same time saying that I was in the wrong spot and my spot was a spot over (how can this be true if the director claimed I have no spot). I told her that I don't think that's the case but could I move it when I get back from work, to which I was basically told 'no', and that it again could be towed and they wanted to avoid a "chain reaction" and get it taken care of as quickly as possible. Well, I drop everything I'm doing at work and walk 20 minutes down to the apartment and get in the garage and surprise surprise my car is in the RIGHT SPOT. I called the Asst. Director back and asked why I just dropped everything and came down for what they were basically pitching as an emergency when in reality  they were making problems where there was literally no issue - they screwed up two times in a row.

The Asst. Director, Tatum, basically took little accountability and seemed confused and miffed as to why I would be upset with the situation, then gave an insincere 'sorry', as if she didn’t know what she was apologizing for, which was a little strange. Again, important to remember that it wasn't a situation where they said 'please just move it tonight and check when you get back', it was instead pitched as it needed handled now in the middle of a workday.
reviews.response_text:
Thank you for your detailed feedback. We sincerely apologize for the elevator issues and the parking confusion you experienced. We understand your frustration, especially regarding the miscommunication about your parking spot and the inconvenience it caused during your workday. We take these concerns seriously and will address them promptly. Our team will review our communication processes to prevent such misunderstandings in the future. Regarding the elevator, we are working on repairs and will strive to improve its functionality. We appreciate your patience and are available if you would like to discuss these matters further to ensure your satisfaction. Please contact us at (720) 680-1578 so we can address your concerns personally and find appropriate solutions.

Best Regards,
Melissa Babcock
Community Director

reviews.author: Jing Cui
reviews.text:
DO NOT RECOMMED. This is first place I stayed since moved to Denver in JUL 2023. At first, it was decent. However, end of 2023, there started to be issues with their hallways smell awful all the time, then they started to kick people out of the buildings. You can find multiple previous residents' reviews - sadly, they are all true. Unfair and inconsistent treatment by the management company - High alert!

On the other hand, this management company will charge you crazy amount of fees despite they told you only certain charges. Now I live in AMLI just a few streets down and know the differences are significant:
- Station's basic water/trash/sewer/gas total is 3 times more than my current apartment!
- Station charges you MORE fee items than other apartments. Get ready for things that you don't understand and valet trash (they also increased valet trash fees without telling residents!!!!)
- Station's parking: you pay for a parking spot but you have to also pay for an additional monthly fee.

There are better options out there...
reviews.response_text: We're concerned to hear about your experience at The Station at Riverfront Park. Your feedback is important to us and we appreciate you sharing it with us. We take all resident concerns seriously and would like to address the issues you've raised. We strive to maintain a clean and pleasant environment for all our residents, and we're sorry to hear that you encountered problems with hallway odors. Regarding fees and charges, we aim to be transparent about all costs associated with living at our property. and disclose these during the leasing process. reviews.author: Sarah Wolfson
reviews.text:
Great location but smelly and poorly managed.

Every time I have guests over they comment on the smell in the hallway and stairwell (which has only been cleaned once in the 6 months I've been here). Also bad sewage smell in some bathrooms. Put in a maintenance request, but they said it's something with the plumbing and nothing to be done about it.

For 3 weeks residents on my floor weren't able to enter or exit our apartments during the workday because of work in the hallway, and we were offered less than half off our rent. Work wasn't finished in three weeks, so we lived in a construction zone for 3 months, without any communication from management about when the hall would be completed or any sort of offer off rent for the continued construction.

reviews.author: Nataly Milić
reviews.text:
**To be as transparent as possible: I am part of the onsite team, but I do live here since November 2023,. While I am part of the team, I am writing a true review of living here, as JUST a resident and NOT as staff**

Despite the ongoing renovations at Station Riverfront community, I couldn't be happier with the location. Being close to the park is essential for me, especially with two dogs. The sense of community among the residents is a wonderful bonus, making it truly feel like home. Since moving in November 2023, I've appreciated the convenience of being able to walk to nearby restaurants, vets, museums, and grocery stores, and drive to all my favorite places like red rocks, mission ballroom, ogden theatre, filmore, and countless bars in the area in a short amount of time! I had a chance to live anywhere, but I wouldn't be as happy as I am living at Station, the convenience tops EVERYTHING!
reviews.response_text:
We're thrilled to hear that you're enjoying your experience at Station Riverfront despite the ongoing renovations. Our prime location is indeed one of our greatest assets, and we're delighted that it's meeting your needs, especially with your furry companions.

It's fantastic to know that you're finding a sense of community among our residents and that you feel right at home. We understand the importance of convenience, and we're glad to hear that our location has made it easy for you to access nearby amenities and your favorite spots in the area.

Thank you for choosing Station Riverfront as your home. We truly appreciate your support and are here to ensure your continued satisfaction. If you ever need anything, please don't hesitate to reach out.

The management of this complex is concerned with fining residents that keep their bikes on their patio but are okay with messes in the apartment complex.

There is an area in the garage that was flooded from a leaking pipe with this horrible smelling orange liquid. Despite my going to the leasing office multiple times to ask the leasing staff to please clean it up, and their promises to clean it, nothing has happened. They also leave trash cans full of the same orange liquid in the stairwells for multiple days.

The only positive of this complex is that they respond to apartment maintenance requests quickly.

reviews.author: Rachel W.
reviews.text:
I have lived at the Station for five months now in a one bedroom that faces the courtyard and the pool. Overall, it has been a pleasant experience. There have been both pros and cons which I list below but that’s to be expected with any community. I have enjoyed my experience here so far and really don’t have many complaints but because I am leaving a public review I want to be honest about the things I like and the things that annoy me.

Pros:

*Quiet community despite the location - neighbors are very quiet and everyone in my building adheres to the quiet hours policy.
* Lots of space in the one bedroom floorplan I lease - two closets (one walk-in), large living area and nice sized bedroom and bathroom.
* Attentive management company - I understand this management company recently took over the property, and they are doing a good job of keeping residents up to date on projects, and host lots of resident events, and are easy to deal with
* Maintenance is responsive and addresses issues quickly and efficiently
* Great location - five minute walk to LoHi, ten minute walk to grocery stores, Ball Arena, Elitch Gardens, bars, restaurants, etc.
* Amenities - package locker, valet trash, hot tub, heated pool, nice clubhouse area, gym, yoga studio, etc.

Cons:

*My unit has a two-sided fireplace that doesn’t work, and will not be fixed - I chose this floorplan for the two-sided fireplace so the fact that it is unusable and I was not told this when I inquired about switching to this floorplan is a little annoying but not a deal breaker either
* Rent seems a little high. Apartments were renovated a few years ago, possibly by the last management company, but in my apartment I can see some cut corners: 1) kitchen sink drain is off center and doesn’t drain properly 2) bathroom sink has rust spots that were present when I moved in 3) fireplace doesn’t work 4) granite countertops are nice but mine has a large, noticeable seam where two pieces were put together 5) bathtub/tile has not been updated in several years and 6) common areas are nice and well maintained but hallways are very dark and sometimes smell a little funny (again, not necessarily a dealbreaker but want to be transparent and honest).
* Constant construction - package room installation, pool area tiles, fire suppression project, elevators often down etc.

Again, overall my experience has been really pleasant and I have enjoyed my time here.
reviews.response_text: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback about your experience at the Station. We appreciate your honesty and understand that every community comes with its own set of pros and cons. We're glad to hear that overall, your time here has been pleasant. If you have any specific concerns or suggestions for improvement, please feel free to reach out to us directly. We value your input and are always striving to enhance our residents' experiences. Thank you again for your review!
