reviews.author: Rashad W
reviews.text: As a frequent visitor of the property I often find comfort when I am greeted by Anthony the concierge, I see here that he is constantly slandered about being rude but I do not get that whatsoever. Just last week there was a young lady (African American) in the lobby calling the security and staff derogatory words because they requested her guest sign in with our new security system and she lost her mind. I was baffled by this behavior because 1. Why would the concierge asking your guest to sign in set you off like this? 2.This is a requirement for all residents why would do you feel exempt. I could not believe an Alcott resident would behave in such a manner but after meeting a few of these residents at our residential events the behavior tracks for some. It brings me a peace of mind that Anthony has remained consistent and fair to all residents where I notice other concierges turn a blind eye and show select favoritism toward certain residents
reviews.response_text:
Hello Rashad,
 
Thank you for sharing your experience at The Alcott. We invite you to reach out to our community management team to discuss this further.

reviews.author: Kane Global
reviews.text:
During a visit to see my sister, I was excited to experience the building and common areas. Unfortunately, the experience was extremely disappointing. The front desk staff member, Anthony, was rude and visibly upset when asked to turn on the television in the common area. He became unprofessional, refused to assist, and then left the building before the end of his shift, leaving the front desk unattended for an extended period of time.
As a guest, this created an uncomfortable and unwelcoming environment. It is upsetting to witness this behavior in what is supposed to be my sister’s home. Overall, my experiences visiting this property have been negative due to staff conduct. I have the video of the interaction as well and will be uploading it to my huge tik tok platform.
reviews.response_text:
Hello,
 
Thank you for sharing your experience. Please contact The Alcott’s community management team at your earliest convenience so we may address your concerns.

reviews.author: aminata kane
reviews.text:
The property itself is beautiful and the resident events are well done. Unfortunately, ongoing issues with staff professionalism have significantly impacted my experience. While most staff members are pleasant, one individual, Anthony, has been consistently rude and unprofessional. I have reached out to both staff and management on multiple occasions, yet these concerns have gone unaddressed.
The lack of response raises concerns about unequal treatment and accountability, which has created an uncomfortable environment for myself and other residents. While the building is aesthetically impressive, the lack of consequences and follow-through regarding staff behavior is disappointing. I would not renew my lease and encourage prospective residents to choose wisely.
Me personally residents should be number 1 priority in a place they will be living while on lease. Sad to say it’s not there priority. Recent incident where staff left because he was asked to turn tv on in the common area he left for the day and now everyday he just ignors me speaks to everyone as they walk in besides me. VERY SAD
reviews.response_text:
Hello Aminata, 
 
Thank you for bringing your concerns directly to our management team. We are working to address the matters you raised. Please contact The Alcott's community management team if you have additional concerns.

reviews.author: Anaya Ware
reviews.text: I toured the Alcott about two weeks ago and I had the best experience with Isabela. She was kind, really attentive and informative. You guys did an excellent job by bringing her on the team. The building was clean and you can tell they really take care of their residents and the living spaces.
reviews.response_text: Hi Anaya, thank you so much for the kind words! We are so happy that Isabela was able to show you our beautiful building and we hope to see you around soon!

reviews.author: Maggie Aris-Williams
reviews.text:
I just had a tour at Alcott l. Lysandra exceeded my expectations. I was genuinely impressed. She was positive, engaging, and exceptionally professional from start to finish. Her depth of knowledge about the property and leasing process was thorough, making what could have been a stressful decision feel smooth and straightforward.

What stood out most was her clear, patient explanations and her willingness to answer every question with warmth and transparency. She was responsive, organized, and genuinely invested in helping me find the right fit. I left with a confident sense of what to expect and a clear next step.
reviews.response_text: Hi Maggie, thank you so much for the kind words! We agree - Lysandra is one of-a-kind and we are thrilled that she was able to show you around and provide you with an in depth understanding of what makes The Alcott a great place to live. Thank you again and we hope to see you around soon!

reviews.author: tiffanie bailey
reviews.text: I toured the Alcott today and LySandra was absolutely amazing! She was very patient, knowledgeable, and generally concerned about my moving needs. The apartments are beautiful, the amenities are stellar, and it smells spectacular in there. I am looking forward to signing a lease.
reviews.response_text: Hi Tiffanie, thank you so much for the five-star review and we cannot wait for you to move in! Thank you for the kind words.

reviews.author: Tonya Hudwell
reviews.text: I recently participated in a walk-in tour of the property after attending a related event and hearing positive feedback from a acquaintance. I was immediately impressed by the building's inherent appeal and beauty. My tour was conducted by Isabela, whose professionalism, extensive knowledge, and patience in addressing my numerous inquiries were exceptional. I also had the opportunity to meet the property manager, who provided a warm and welcoming impression. The overall experience has solidified my decision, and I eagerly anticipate moving in. The team's excellent work is commendable.
reviews.response_text: Hi Tonya, we are thrilled to have you! Thank you so much for the five-star review. We are so happy that Isabela was able to show you around our beautiful property and we hope you love it for years to come.

reviews.author: Lore Baruwa
reviews.text: The place is beautiful but I’ve been here 6 weeks and it’s infested with gnats. It’s been like that since day one. I can’t even eat my food in peace. I requested 5 different times for pest control to come. When they finally came, I was told there’s a plumbing issue and that multiple tenants have been complaining about the same issue. It’s unfortunate because I will most likely break my lease as this is an unpleasant experience. The picture below is from me using a trap after 2-3 days. There’s no reason I should have this many gnats in my apartment! I have to set up so many traps around the house and was told by them to just pour bleach down my drain every 2 days for a month to fix the issue. I don’t pay this much money to have to do that. It’s insane
reviews.response_text:
Hi Lore,
 
Thank you for your feedback. 
 
We believe the concern about gnats has been resolved, as it was recently addressed by pest control and our maintenance team at The Alcott. It was unrelated to plumbing.
 
We appreciate you choosing The Alcott as your home. We are here to help and want to ensure you have an enjoyable experience. If you have any additional questions or concerns, please contact The Alcott management team directly so we can promptly address them. Thank you.

reviews.author: Brian Sprouse
reviews.text: Lysandra was fantastic—very personable and knowledgeable. She gave an amazing tour and shared great insights about the property. The building is beautifully designed and packed with amenities. The apartment itself has impressive closet space. This is definitely a must-see, must-live property!
reviews.response_text: Hi Brian, thank you so much for the kind five-star review! We are so happy that Lysandra did a great job of touring you around our beautiful property. We hope to see you around soon!
